Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza engedzwa ha dzhenerasheni ntswa kha giridi, zwo itwaho uri zwi swikelelwe nga murahu ha ṱanganedza tsheo ya tendela vhabveledzi vha fulufulu vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe uri na vhone vha bveledzise muḓagasi.

src_text: Our well-functioning, strong and independent South African Reserve Bank is helping to shield society from the ravages of inflation by keeping it within narrow target range; well below what many other countries are currently experiencing.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo saina ḽińwalo ḽa thendelano ya ḓo renga 150 MW ya khaphasithi ya fulufulu bva kha vharengisi vha fulufulu ḽi konaho vusuludzwa nga huswa, vha Scatec ASA.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the decision by National Treasury to grant an extension of the reduction in the General Fuel Levy (GFL).
tgt_text: Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya Broad-Based Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE).

src_text: The GFL was cut by  50 litre for April and May, and will be further extended from 1 June to 6 July.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya B-BBEE ntswa kha ḽino shango yo khethwaho nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.

Khoro iyi yo vhumbwa nga zwigwada zwo fhambanaho zwa vhathu vha bvaho kha zwa vhubindudzi, yunioni dza mbambadzo, madzangano ḓitikaho nga lushaka khathihi na vha zwa pfunzo, Itsho tshigwada tshi ḓovha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha tsivhudza muvhuso kha maga u shandukisa ikonomi.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision of the Competition Commission to closely monitor prices of essential food items, particularly the provision that businesses should justify their price increases.
tgt_text: Naho honovha na tshanduko khulwane kha shandukiswa ha maitele muvhuso wa tshiṱalula kha Ikonomi, hu tshe na zwinzhi zwine zwa khou fanela itwa siani ḽa zwa ndangulo khwinisa zwikili khathihi na vula zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa vhoramabindu vha mafumakadzi na vhaswa.

src_text: Japan-South Africa Business Forum.
tgt_text: Miḓalo.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the recent Japan-South Africa Business Forum, which agreed to an ambitious work programme that includes collaboration on green industrialisation, electric vehicle technologies and green hydrogen..
tgt_text: Masheleni bvaho kha muvhuso u thusa kha mavunḓu kwameaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo khou thusa nga nḓila yavhudi.

src_text: The forum also agreed to virtual ‘roadshow’ to highlight South African opportunities to more Japanese businesses, skills development in the local auto industry, work streams on manufacturing opportunities and the exchange of technical experiences.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo kona ṋetshedza tshumelo ya nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, maḓi kunaho na madzulo kha vhathu vho xelelwaho nga mahaya khathihi na lugisa themamveledziso dzo vhaisalaho.

src_text: Japan is one of our most important trade partners and leading investor in number of South African sectors, ranging from automobiles to advanced mining machinery, and from agribusiness to financial services.
tgt_text: Mushumo muhulwane nḓilani wa vhuedzedza tshumelo dza fhasisa sa nḓisedzo ya maḓi, muḓagasi, mabunga khathihi na kulumaga mashika.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the establishment of the Black Exporters Network by the Department of Trade, Industry and Competition (the dtic), to bring together black-owned firms which are currently exporting locally made goods to other parts of the world.
tgt_text: Masheleni swikalo R189, 217 miḽioni khou shumiswa kha khwiṋisa Mbekanyamushumo ya Madzulo songo Tendelwaho zwi tshi khou itelwa khwiṋisa nzulelo dza vhadzulapo vha fhethu hu songo tendelwaho..     Masheleni mańwe hafhu swikaho R733, 086 miḽioni ṋetshedzwa nga vha Ndiliso ya Madzulo Vhathu hu itela thusa kha fhaṱiwa fhethu huswa ho tendelwaho dzula vhathu.

src_text: The network will enable the sharing of information, experience and know-how, and it builds on the successes of the Black industrialist Programme..   Energy.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza na livhuwa thikhedzo bvaho kha Shango ḽa Qatar zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, dzidzhenereitha, zwikunakisi zwa maḓi, madennde khathihi na nḓisedzo ya mishonga ya alafha.

src_text: Our long-term energy security has been given massive boost following the commercial handover of Unit 4 at the Kusile Power Station in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ndambedzo iyi ḓo thusa vhadzulapo vha swikaho 4 000 vhane zwa zwino vhana madzulo vha khou dzula sentharani dza muvhuso.

src_text: This handover marks another milestone in Eskom’s efforts to stabilise the power system and will add 800 megawatts (MW) to the power grid..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thuso ya zwa vhuthusavhathu bva kha shango ḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa khathihi na maḓi kunaho zwi ḓo newa avho vho welwaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mveledziso dza zwa Matshilisano.

src_text: Cabinet noted that the construction of four out of the six generation units had been completed at the Kusile Power Station project..
tgt_text: 1    Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya Matshilisano tsho ṋetshedzwaho nga vha Tshumisano ya Mveledziso dza Nḓowetshumo (IDC) vho ṱangana na ofisi ya Presidennde khathihi na vha dtic.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the addition of new generation capacity to the grid, which was made possible by the decision to allow independent power producers to produce electricity.
tgt_text: Thikhedzo iyi ḓo bveledzisa zwikhala zwa mishumo kha vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 hune vha ḓovha vha khou shumela zwitshavhani zwa mahayani.. 2    Thikhedzo iyi ḓo ṋetshedza thusa ya ndondola mutakalo kha zwitshavha, zwiḽiwa na dzikhishi dzi ṋetshedzaho sobo dza pfushi ṱuṱuwedza zwa ńwala na vhala ṋetshedza dzi mbekanyamushumo dzi tsivhudzaho vhathu nga ha tsireledza mupo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhaswa.

src_text: Government recently signed an agreement to buy 150 MW of capacity from renewable power producer, Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Tshikwama tsho tshi ḓo tikedza zwitshavha zwi swikaho 26 honeha hu si na ndavhelelo ya mbuyelo ya masheleni.

src_text: Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE) Advisory Council.
tgt_text: Zwa Vhugevhenga na Tshanḓanguvhoni.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the appointment by President Cyril Ramaphosa of the country’s new B-BBEE Advisory Council.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa fariwa ha vhathu vha tshivhalo vha khou ṱumanywaho na zwa tswa wanala na masheleni hombokiwaho khathihi na maitele tshanḓanguvhoni.

src_text: The council comprises diverse group of people from business, trade unions, community-based organisations and academia, who will be responsible for guiding government on the transformation of the economy.
tgt_text: Hu tshi katelwa na vhashumi vhakale vha muvhuso vhe vha vha vha kha vhuimo ha nṱha, vhańwe vha hone vho livhana na mulayo nga mulandu wa kandekanya Mulayo wa Vhulanguli ha Masheleni Lushaka, wa 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: While there has been remarkable progress in reversing apartheid’s distortions on the economy, more work still needs to be done in increasing black management control, upscaling skills development and broadening procurement to give opportunities to black women and the youth.
tgt_text: Kha farwa ho hu katelwa na farwa ha mushumi wa Muhasho wa zwa Muno ngei sentharani ya dzula vhafhalali ya Desmond Tutu wanalaho Pitori nga murahu ha hweswa mulandu wa ṱanganedza masheleni tshanḓanguvhoni bva kha muṅwe wa vhabvannḓa - izwo zwi tou vha tsumbo ya uri huna muthu ane avha nṱha ha mulayo nahone huna tshikhala tsha vhashumi vha sa fulufhedzei kha ofisi dza muvhuso..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza muvhigo wa farwa ha vhanna vhavhili ri vha vhuye ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vha divhiwaho sa MaGupta, madzina avho ndi Rajesh na Atul.

src_text: Floods.
tgt_text: Izwi ndi nga murahu ha muvhigo wa zwezwino wo ṱahiswaho wa uri vho fariwa ngei Dubai kha ḽa UAE he zwa ḓivhadzwa nga Dzangano ḽa Mapholisa kha Vhugevhenga ḽa Dzitshaka (Interpol).

src_text: Ongoing government relief efforts in the provinces affected by the recent devastating floods are making significant impact.
tgt_text: Avho murathu na mukomana vha khou ṱodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga murahu ha ṱumanywa na vhugevhenga ha dzhia ndaulo ya muvhuso, vhufhura khathihi na vha na masheleni tshandanguvhoni.

src_text: Government has prioritised the provision of food, water and shelter for displaced people and the repair of damaged infrastructure.
tgt_text: Nyambedzano vhukati ha mazhendezi mihasho mulayo vhukati ha shango ḽa UAE na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe dzi khou bvelaphanḓa farwa havho hu sumbedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha ulwa na vhugevhenga khathihi na tshanḓanguvhoni hu si na nyofho kana tshiḓivhano farwa ha avho vhanna zwi sumbedza ri nḓila dza kutshimbidzele kwa zwithu dzi khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha vhona ri vhakandekanyaho mulayo vha khou livhanyiswa na wo nahone huna muthu re nṱha ha mulayo..     Khabinethe yo sasaladza maitele mavhi u nyadza ikonomi na shango ḽashu nga murahu ha zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha thambo dza muḓagasi ngei kha Yunithi 1 ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Eskom vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Extensive work is underway to restore basic services such as water, electricity, sanitation and waste removal.
tgt_text: Ndi lwa vhuṋa izwo zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha zwiṱitshi zwa muḓagasi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga murahu ha musi hu tshi khou tou bva vhigwa zwiṅwe zwiraru zwe zwa tshinyadzwa vhegeni dzo fhiraho.

src_text: About R189, 217 million is being used for the Upgrading of the Informal Settlements Programme aimed at improving the quality of life of informal settlement dwellers.
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dza zwezwino dzi tou vha tsumbo ya ri hu tshe na mushumo muhulwane une lushaka lwa fanela ita ri lushaka lu kone tsireledzea.

Zwiito zwa vhugevhenga zwi khou bvelelaho zwi ri sumbedza ri nḓila ya fhungudza vhugevhenga ndi vhuḓifhinduleli hashu roṱhe sa lushaka - ri tshi katela mapholisa, vharangaphanḓa vha madzangano poḽotiki, vhorambindu, vhashumi khathihi na vhadzulapo - roṱhe nga tou angaredza ri fanela ulwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga..     Khabinethe khou fulufhela ri gwama ḽe ḽa ṋetshedzwa vha Minisiṱiri wa Mapholisa itela thusa zwiṱitshi zwa mapholisa zwine zwa vha na tshivhalo tsha nṱha kha milandu ingaho mabulayo tshipiwa khathihi na mińwe milandu zwi ḓo thusa ri zwitshavha zwa vhathu zwi tsireledzee.

src_text: An additional R733, 086 million has been allocated through the Human Settlements Development Grant to assist in the creation of sustainable and integrated human settlements..
tgt_text: Maswamaswa nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the humanitarian aid from the State of Qatar in the form of foodstuff, clothing, generators, water purifiers, ventilators, tents and medical supplies.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo humbudza lushaka zwauri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshe hone nahone ri fanela isa phanḓa na maitele oṱhe u ḓitsireledza na tsireledza vhańwe.

src_text: The donation will benefit over 4 000 citizens temporarily housed in community care centres.
tgt_text: Maitele u ḓitsireledza katela ṱamba zwanḓa kana sanithaiza zwanḓa misi yoṱhe dzulela ambara masiki ri dzi pherani dzulela sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe vula mafasiṱere ri hu dzhene muya khathihi na hayeliwa..     Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the humanitarian aid from the United Arab Emirates (UAE) in the form of foodstuff and water to assist victims of the recent floods.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱangadzedza mulevho, muani na vhuḓikumedzeli zwo dzhiwaho kha Guvhangano ḽi lwaho na maitele zwa Vhuravhele na Dzitshandukiso dzi si ho Mulayoni kha dzhango ḽa Afrika wo farelwaho Malabo, kha Riphabuḽiki ya Equatorial Guinea, nga Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule.

src_text: Launch of Social Development Fund.
tgt_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango ḽa Afrika vho lavhelesa zwiwo zwa shushedza, vha sedza nḓila ya khwine ya kufhindulele kha ayo maitele khathihi na ḓiimisela tsireledza mashango ane avha miraḓo ya dzangano ane khou ṱangana na khaedu dza zwa vhuravhele na maitele u vhaiswa..     Vhulwadze ha Monkeypox.

src_text: 1  Cabinet welcomed the launch of the Social Employment Fund by the Industrial Development Corporation (IDC) in partnership with the Presidency and the dtic.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadza vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwa ri vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakolo vho ḓiimisela tshothe kha lavhelesana na thivhela vhulwadze ha Monkeypox, zwi tshi tevhela dzhena haho kha mashango vhalaho songo ḓoweleaho kha zwa tshoṱelwa nga malwadze.

src_text: The support will provide bridging employment opportunities for up to 50 000 young persons in socially-useful work being done in local communities.. 2  The support will include  health and community care, food and nutrition support like soup kitchens, promotion of literacy, greening and climate change mitigation programmes as well as  and youth support initiatives.
tgt_text: Ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe hu saathu vha na muthu na muthihi no ṱolwaho kana kavhiwaho nga uvho vhulwadze, vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakalo kha ḽi no shango vha kati tshoṱhe na lavhelesana na uvho vhulwadze     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: The Fund will support 26 community and not-for-profit enterprises.
tgt_text: Vhukwamani na Lushaka nga ha Maga ane nga Dzhiwa kha Ulwa na Zwiito zwi si ho Mulayoni zwa Rengisa Tsimbi dza Kale.

src_text: Crime and corruption.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na zwa ri huvhe na nyambedzano dzi katelaho lushaka nga ha khumbelo dzo ṱahisiwaho dza thivhela zwiito zwa rengiswa ha tsimbi dza kale na dza zwino.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the arrest of several individuals in connection with fraud, money laundering and corruption.
tgt_text: Zwa tswiwa ha tsimbi dza kale na thambo dza khopha kha themamveledziso dza muvhuso zwi kwama nyaluwo ya ikonomi nga nḓila si yavhuḓi..     Khaedu dzine dza vha hone dzi katela kwamea ha nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi na tshumelo dza zwidimela nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwiporo.

src_text: These include former high ranking state and parastatal employees, some of whom face charges relating to the contravention of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Izwi zwi kwama vhaṋameli nga vha engedzela thaidzo ya masheleni u tshimbila nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwidimela.

src_text: The arrests – which include that of Home Affairs official at the Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre in Pretoria who allegedly accepted bribe from foreign national – bear testimony to the fact that no one is above the law and that there is no space for dishonest employees in the public sector..
tgt_text: Thambo dza muḓagasi dzo ṱhukhukanywaho dzi vhea lushaka kha tshiimo tsha khombo, nga maanḓa vhana vhaṱuku..     Khabinet yo ṋea maanḓa vha Muhasho wa dtic ri vha tshimbidze iyo miṱangano nga tshifhinga tshe vha ṋewa tshone, nahone vha fanela vhudzisa lushaka uri hu fanela itwa mini ri muvhuso kone fhelisa maitele mavhi u tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso dza vhuṱhogwa kha khwaṱhisa ikonomi.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the progress being made on the extradition of the Gupta brothers, Rajesh and Atul, back to South Africa.
tgt_text: Zwezwo nga murahu, Khabinethe ḓo kona ṱahisa maga khethwaho kha ulwa na yo maitele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: This follows their recent arrest at Dubai in the UAE after the International Criminal Police Organisation (Interpol) had issued red notices.
tgt_text: Tshumisano ya Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi na Peacekeeping International Symposium (PTPS).

src_text: The brothers are wanted in South Africa in connection with their alleged role in state capture, including fraud and money laundering.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa fara muṱangano wa vhurathi wa zwa PTPS na vha Khoro ya Sainthifiki na Thoḓisiso ya Nḓowetshumo ngei Piṱori bva nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Fulwi.

src_text: Discussions between law-enforcement agencies in the UAE and South Africa on their extradition are underway.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo khou lavhelelwa dzhenelwa nga vharangaphanḓa vha swikaho 300 vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo swikaho.

src_text: Their arrest demonstrates government’s determination to fight crime and corruption without fear or favour..
These arrests demonstrate that processes and mechanisms are working effectively to hold perpetrators accountable for their heinous actions and ensure that no one is above the law..
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo dzhenelwa nga maswole, mapholisa, na vhathu vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN vha tshiitela pfumbudzana nga ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya tshizwino, yo khwinifhadzwaho na mbekanyamaitele dza vhurangeli kha puḽane dza UN.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the blatant attempt to undermine our economy and country following the malicious damage to cable at Unit 1 of Eskom's Matla Power Station in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo shumiswa sa fhethu ha ṱahisa mafhungo fhambanaho khathihi na fha zwikhala miraḓo ya UN vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha zwa ḓisa mulalo hu tshi khou shumiswa thekhinoḽodzhi ya puḽane dza ḓisa mulalo.

src_text: This was the fourth incident of suspected sabotage at power station after similar incidents were reported at three other power stations in the past few weeks.
tgt_text: Muṱatisano wa Lushaka no Fariwa Ṅwaha Muṅwe na Muṅwe wa Vhuṋa wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha Zwikili zwa Ḽifhasi (WSZA).

src_text: The recent crime statistics are reflection that we must do more as society to make our communities safer.
tgt_text: Muṱaṱisano wa lushaka farwaho ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe  4th  WSZA khou farelwa ngei Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga ḽa 7 swika 10 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ya: “Ratcheting up the Production of 21st Century Artisans”..     Tshipikwa tsha farwa ha uyo muṱangano ndi ṱuṱuwedza zwikili zwa athizene sa izwi ḽi buḓo ḽi shumaho zwavhuḓi khathihi na vula zwikhala zwa vhushumisani kha iḽo buḓo dovha hafhu wa shumiswa sedzuluse zwikalo zwa vhane vho lugelwa nga guda khathihi na kona vhona uri ndi vhafhio vhane vha nga khwinifhadza nga kha tshikhala tsha ṱanganedza vhagudi vhane vha khou ṱoda dzhia athizene sa buḓo ḽavho     MilaedzaNdiliso Khabinethe yo tevhedza Phresindennde Vho Ramaphosa kha rumela ndiliso kha vha muṱa wa Vhuhosini na lushaka lwa vha amaMpondo Kingdom zwi tshi tevhela ri sia shango ha KhosiKhulu Vho Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.1)    Vho Jacob Ganny Mbele sa Muofisiri Mulanguli Muhulwane (DG) wa Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Mineraḽa na Fulufulu2)    Mufumakadzi Vho Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada sa Tshanḓa tsha Muofisiri Mulanguli kha Muhasho wa zwa Mupo Vhusimamiri na Vhureakhovhe3)    Mufumakadzi Vho Susan Mafanedza Masapu sa Mutsivhudzi kha Mulayo Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Mulayotewa.

src_text: This reality reminds us that reducing crime is societal responsibility and that all of us – including the police, political leaders, communities, families, business people, workers and civil society – should play our part in fighting crime..
tgt_text: 4)    Mufumakadzi Vho Doris Tshepe sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Vhuṱaṱisani.5)    Dokotela Vho Alex Mahapa sa Mueletshedzi wa tshifhinga tshoṱhe kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.6)    Muimeleli Vho Rams Ramashia sa Mueletshedzi nga zwifhinga kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.

src_text: ISSUES IN THE ENVIRONMENT.
tgt_text: Tshanduko ya Kilima.

src_text: Climate Change.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza madalo kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Alok Sharma, Phresidennde wa Muṱangano wa nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima wa Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) wa vhu 26 bva nga ḽa 19 swika ḽa 21 Fulwi 2022 khathihi na tsenguluso yavho ya uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽo sumbedza vhuḓikumedzeli vhu re khagala kha zwa shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the visit to South Africa by Mr Alok Sharma, President of the 26th United Nations (UN) Climate Change Summit, from 19 to 21 June 2022, and his assessment that South Africa has shown clear commitment to clean energy transition.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho vha tshipiḓa tsha vhaṅwe vharangaphanḓa musi vha tshi ḓivhadza tshumisano ya ḓivhazwakale vhukati ha shango ḽashu na mivhuso ya mashango fanaho na ḽa France, Germany, United Kingdom, United States, hu tshi katelwa na European Union ya tikedza tshanduko pfadzaho ya ya kha ikonomi ine ya vha na muhasaladzo wa khaboni ya fhasi khathihi na tshitshavha tshi konḓelelaho tshanduko ya kilima.

src_text: In 2021, President Cyril Ramaphosa joined other leaders in announcing historic partnership with the governments of France, Germany, United Kingdom and United States, as well as the European Union, to support just transition to low carbon economy and climate resilient society.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo shuma vhukuma kha ita ndugiselo dza shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho khathihi na ya kha zwiko zwa fulufulu ḽo kunaho zwine zwa fana na haiḓirodzheni yo kunaho, bayomasi, fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha muya, fulufulu ḽa masana ḓuvha na fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha maḓi, na zwiṅwe zwinzhi zwi vusuludzeaho.

src_text: South Africa has been hard at work in preparing the ground for our clean energy transition and move to clean energy sources such as green hydrogen, biomass, wind power, solar power and hydro-power, among other renewables.
tgt_text: Izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa fulufulu ḽo vanganaho ndi zwone zwine zwa ita uri hu vhe na ndinganyiso vhukati ha zwiko zwa fulufulu hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisedza nḓisedzo ya fulufulu ḽi fulufhedzeaho uri hu kone swikelwa ṱhoḓea dza fulufulu dzine dza khou engedzea nga luvhilo fhano shangoni shumiswa ha khaelo dza Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

src_text: This so-called energy mix allows for balance between energy sources to ensure reliable power to meet the country’s growing energy needs.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwihulwane ha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga COVID-19 zwe zwa rekhodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho nahone khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vho teaho uri vha bvele phanḓa na haelwa, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo thusa kha thivhela lwala lwo kalulaho valelwa vhuongeloni na lufu.

src_text: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) vaccine uptake.
tgt_text: Hafu ya vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha vhaaluwa vha Afrika Tshipembe vho no wana phimamushonga ya khaelo nthihi ya COVID-19 swika zwino.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the significant drop in COVID-19 infections recorded in South Africa over the past few weeks and encouraged all eligible people to  continue  to vaccinate, which helps to prevent serious illness, hospitalisation and death.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou dzudzanya shumisa masheleni khadzimiso ya nzwalelo dza fhasi ane kha ḓi tou bva tendelwa nga vha Bannga ya Ḽifhasi kha renga dziṅwe phimamushonga dza khaelo ya COVID-19 dza ḓadzisa khathihi na vhona uri lushaka lwo tsireledzwa nga nḓila yo teaho kha kavhiwa hune ha nga vha hone.

src_text: Half of all adult South Africans have to date received at least one COVID-19 vaccine dose.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha zwa ndangulo ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19, nga maanḓa mvelaphanḓa ine ya khou itwa musi ho sedzwa zwa vhuyela tshoṱhe kha maitele ḓoweleaho zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.

src_text: Government aims to use the low-interest loan recently approved by the World Bank to purchase additional COVID-19 vaccine doses and ensure that the nation is adequately protected against potential infections.
tgt_text: Minisiṱa wa zwa Mutakalo, Dokotela Vho Joe Phaahla, vha ḓo netshedza zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓadzisa.

src_text: Cabinet also considered matters related to developments on the management of the COVID-19 pandemic, particularly with the progress being made towards full return to normal socio-economic activities.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka.

src_text: The Minister of Health, Dr Joe Phaahla, will provide further details.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe nge vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzi tsha Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka nga Ḽavhuṋa, 16 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U bveledza mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo havhuḓi.” Muya wa mafulufulu na konḓelela we wa sumbedzwa nga vhaswa mona na shango ḽashu, nangoho ndi zwithu zwine zwa tea fhululedzwa na dzhiiwa sa fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha khwine.

src_text: National Youth Day  .
tgt_text: Musi ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa Lushaka tshi khou swika magumoni, kha ri khwaṱhise nungo dzashu itela uri vhaswa vha kone swikela vhunzhi ha mbekanyamushumo dza thikhedzo dzine dza netshedzwa nga muvhuso khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa dzhenela havho kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho..   Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwane, wo dzhenelela kha khaedu iyi nga ita uri matshudeni vho phasaho digirii dzavho vhane vha sa shume vha wane tshenzhemo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo dza Ngudo na Vhugudelamushumo dza Muvhuso dzo livhiswaho kha Vhagudiswa vho fhedzaho Digirii dzavho.

src_text: Cabinet thanked all South Africans for joining in the country’s National Youth Day commemorations on Thursday, 16 June 2022 under the theme: “Promoting sustainable livelihood and resilience of young people for better tomorrow.” The spirit of enthusiasm and resilience shown by the youth across our nation is indeed cause for celebration and hope for better tomorrow.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa shumisa Tshikwama Tsha sika Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano (SEF) khathihi na vusuludza maga u sika mishumo vha tshiimiswa tsha Tshumelo ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYS) lune tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha zwiimiswa izwi tsha ḓo kunga vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 kha ikonomi.

src_text: As National Youth Month draws to an end, let us intensify our efforts to ensure young people access the many support programmes provided by government and facilitate their active participation in the economy.
tgt_text: Haya maga ha nga ḓo tou ṋetshedza fhedzi tshenzhemo ya mushumo ine ya ṱoḓea ngaurali, fhedzi ḓo dovha hafhu khwaṱhisedza ndeme ya vha vhadzulapo vha re na ṱhogomelo.

src_text: The Public Service, as the largest employer, has responded to this challenge by enabling unemployed graduates to gain experience through the Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.
tgt_text: Vha SEF vha shumisana na madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso (dzi NGO) ngeno vha NYS vha tshi shumisa vhaswa kha tshumelo dzi vhuedzaho tshitshavha mona na shango.

src_text: Government is also implementing the Social Employment Fund (SEF) and revitalised National Youth Service (NYS) job-creation initiatives that will each draw 50 000 young people into the economy.
tgt_text: Vhuendi.

src_text: These initiatives will not only provide much-needed work experience but will also reinforce the value of active citizenship.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya Shuma ya Nṱha dza 11 yo livhiswaho kha fhelisa thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na tholwa ha vhadzulapo vha mashango nnḓa sa vhareili vha maṱiraka.

src_text: The SEF partners with non-governmental organisations (NGOs) while the NYS enlists young people for services which benefit communities across the country..     Transport .
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ye ya bveledzwa nga Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisiṱa ya nga ha Vhuendi ha Badani na Vhuendedzathundu (IMC) vha tshi shumisana na vha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhuendi ha badani na vhuendedzathundu ṱuṱuwedza zwa khwaṱhiswa ha ṱhoḓea dza visa khathihi na tevhedzwa ha milayo ya zwa vhashumi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 11-point Action Plan to deal with road blockages and recruitment of foreign nationals as truck drivers.
tgt_text: IMC yo vhumbwa hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na migwalabo ya vhareili vha maṱiraka vha Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The plan, which was developed by the Road and Freight Inter-Ministerial Committee (IMC) in partnership with the road and freight industry stakeholders, promotes amongst others the enforcement of visa requirements and compliance with labour laws.
tgt_text: Migwalabo na thivhiwa ha dzibada zwi kwama matshimbilele vhathu na thundu nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, zwa tshuwisa vhabindudzi vha mashango nnḓa nahone zwa ndemesa, zwa kwama ikonomi na nḓila dza nḓisedzo dza thundu na tshumelo dza ndeme dzine dza shumisa magondo eneo kwameaho.

src_text: The IMC was formed to deal with escalating road blockages and protests by disgruntled South African truck drivers.
tgt_text: Ṱhahelelo ya maḓi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: Protests and road blockages adversely impact mobility, scare foreign investors and most importantly, negatively impact the economy and essential supply chains which use affected corridors.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa NMB kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha u thivhela Ḓuvha ḽa sa vha na Shotha na Ḽithihi ḽa Maḓi sa izwi vunḓu ḽi tshi khou livhana na ṱhahelelo khulwane ya maḓi ye ya thoma bva nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB) Metropolitan Municipality water shortages.
tgt_text: Vha DWS vha khou shumisana na vunḓu kha thoma shumisa maga tshifhinga tshipfufhi, tsha vhukati na tshilapfu itela tandulula na fhungudza thaidzo ya masiandaitwa gomelelo ane nga vha hone.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the intervention of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) in the NMB Metropolitan Municipality in the Eastern Cape to avert Day Zero as the province is facing severe water shortages which started in.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya kwengweledza vhadzulapo vha NMB uri vha tevhedze milayo yo vhewaho ya fhungudzwa ha maḓi nga masipala wapo itela vhona uri hu khou dzulela vha na nḓisedzo yo teaho ya maḓi.

src_text: The DWS is working with the province to implement short, medium and long-term measures to address and mitigate the potential impact of the drought.
tgt_text: Nga angaredza, kushumiselwe kwa maḓi ku tea fhungudzwa ya kha ḽithara dza 50 miḽioni nga ḓuvha bva kha tshikalo tsha zwino tsha ḽithara dza 280 miḽioni nga ḓuvha.

src_text: Cabinet further urged the residents of NMB to adhere to water restrictions imposed by local municipalities to ensure water security.
tgt_text: Vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.

src_text: Overall, water use must be reduced by 50 million litres per day, from the current level of 280 million litres per day down to 230 million litres per day.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha zwenezwino ha muofisiri wa Muhasho wa Muno ane shuma fhaḽa kha ofisi ya Benoni nge wanala ṋetshedza phasipoto ya vhufhura kha mudzulapo wa shango ḽa Bangladesh.

src_text: Crime and corruption  .
tgt_text: Muofisiri, Mufumakadzi Vho Sibongile Simelane, vho ṋewa beiḽi ya masheleni linganaho R5 000 ngei Khothe ya Madzhisiṱiraṱa ya Benoni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Fulwi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the recent arrest of Home Affairs official stationed at the Benoni office for issuing fraudulent passport to Bangladeshi national.
tgt_text: Mudzulapo wa Bangladesh, Vho Fahim Kazi, vho farwa musi vha tshi khou lingedza ṱuwa kha ḽino nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022 vha tshi khou shumisa dzina ḽa, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: The official, Ms Sibongile Simelane, was granted R5 000 bail in the Benoni Magistrate's Court on Tuesday, 21 June.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa zwa Muno (DHA) kha ḓi tou bva humisela murahu shangoni ḽawe mutambi wa matambwa bvaho kha ḽa Lithuania, Mufumakadzi Vho Ieva Andrejevaite vhe vha lingedza shumisa milayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yone ya ndangulo ya zwa vhufhalali ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi luka mafhungo mazwifhi uri vha khou ṱoḓa ita khumbelo ya ṋewa vhudzumbamo nga mulandu wa “nndwa ine ya khou bvela phanḓa ngei kha ḽa Ukraine”.

src_text: The Bangladeshi national, Mr Fahim Kazi, was arrested while trying to leave the country on 12 May 2022 under the name, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza mushumo une wa khou itwa nga vha Yunithi ya lwa na Zwiito zwa Vhuaḓa ya DHA.

src_text: The Department of Home Affairs (DHA) recently deported Lithuanian actress, Ms Ieva Andrejevaite, who sought to abuse South Africa’s refugee management regime when she fabricated story of wanting to apply for asylum because of the “war in Ukraine”.
tgt_text: Yo khoḓa na ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo zwavho vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhiga zwiito zwenezwo zwa vhugevhenga.

src_text: Cabinet commends the work being done by the DHA’s Counter Corruption Unit.
tgt_text: Zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha rengisa ṱhalusavhuṋe dzavho zwi na masiandaitwa vhavhaho vhukuma kha tsireledzo ya shango na tshiimo tshaḽo tsha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.

src_text: It applauds and encourages ordinary South Africans to continue to report such criminal acts.
tgt_text: Muvhuso ḓo bvela phanḓa na lwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho na muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane ḓidzhenisa kha zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwine zwa fhedza zwi tshi nyadzisa milayo yashu ya zwa vhupfuluwi, hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia.

src_text: The unlawful acts of South Africans who sell their identities have far-reaching negative implications for the country’s security and socio-economic status.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa ha zwenezwino ha mudededzi wa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban Mufumakadzi Vho Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37), vhe vha gwevhiwa miṅwaha miraru vhe nga fhasi ha vhulavhelesi ha vhululamisi na miṅwaha miṋa vho valelwa dzhele, tshigwevho itshi tshoṱhe tshi tshi ḓo fhahewa lwa miṅwaha miraru, ngei Khothe ya Dzingu ya Umlazi kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga mulandu wa pfuka Mulayo wa Khetho dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa ṅwaha wa 2000 (Mulayo 27 wa 2000).

src_text: Government will continue to deal harshly against anyone involved in illegal acts that undermine our immigration laws, without fear or favour.
tgt_text: Sa mudededzi kha tshikolo tshe tsha vha tshi khou shumiswa sa tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo nga tshifhinga tsha Khetho dza Masipala nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021, Mufumakadzi Vho Gabuza vho ḓivhona mulandu wa vhufhura ha khetha lwa tshivhalo tshi linganaho 24 kha Khetho dza Masipala ngeno huṅwe khetha ha tshiṅwe tshivhalo tshi linganaho 12 vho hu ita kha Khetho dza Wadi.

src_text: Cabinet  also welcomed the recent conviction and sentencing of Durban teacher, Ms Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – who was sentenced to three years' correctional supervision and four years' imprisonment, wholly suspended for three years, in the Umlazi Regional Court in KwaZulu-Natal – for contravening the Local Government Municipal Electoral Act, 2000 (Act 27 of 2000).
tgt_text: Uhu wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa hu nyadzisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha Khomishini ya zwa Khetho ya Afrika Tshipembe ha dzhenelela nga tshifhinga khathihi na shumisa maitele ndangulo ya masiandaitwa.

src_text: As teacher at the school which was used as voting station during the Municipal Elections in October 2021, Ms Gabuza pleaded guilty for fraudulently casting 24 votes, including 12 for the Municipal Elections and 12 for the Ward Elections.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha khwaṱhisedzo khulwane ya sisiṱeme dza khetho, dzine bva zwenezwo dzo no mbo ḓi khwaṱhisedzwa nga ḓivhadzwa ha Tshishumiswa zwa Ndangulo ya Vhakhethi tshine tsha kona thivhela zwa voutha luvhili.

src_text: The conviction and sentencing underscore the Electoral Commission of South Africa’s commitment to intervene timeously and apply consequence management.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri khetho ndi dzone thikho ya dimokirasi yashu nahone dzi tea tsireledzwa nga nungo dzoṱhe.

src_text: This is also strong affirmation of the electoral systems, which have since been strengthened with the introduction of the Voter Management Device that prevents double voting.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa vhu 12 (MC12) wa Dzangano ḽa Mbambadzo ḽa Ḽifhasi (WTO).

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that elections are the cornerstone of our democracy and must be protected at all costs..     World Trade Organisation (WTO) 12th Ministerial Conference (MC12).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza WTO MC12 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Geneva, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 12 swika ḽa 17 Fulwi 2022, nga maanḓa tsheo ya uri mashango teaho nga fhelisa ṱhanziela dza khaelo ya Covid-19 swika nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the WTO MC12 held in Geneva, Switzerland from 12 to 17 June 2022, in particular the decision that eligible countries could override COVID-19 vaccine patents until.
tgt_text: Tsheo nga ha uri hone izwi zwi nga vha zwo tea pfukiselwa kha dzilafho na vhuṱhaṱhuvhi ha COVID-19 yo humiselwa murahu lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya rathi.

src_text: The decision on whether to extend this to COVID-19 therapeutics and diagnostics was delayed for six months.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha ḽone ḽe ḽa ranga phanḓa khuwelelo ya uri vha WTO vha fhelise zwa pfanelo dza ndaka dza vhubveledzi dzine dza vha hone kha khaelo dza COVID-19 lune hezwi zwa ḓo ita uri hu vhe na swikela khaelo nga nḓila linganaho khathihi na ita uri mashango re na vhukoni ha bveledza khaelo dzenedzi ite ngauralo.

src_text: South Africa had been leading the call for the WTO to waiver intellectual property rights tied to COVID-19 vaccines that will ensure equal access to vaccines and enable countries that have the capability to manufacture vaccines to do so.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wo dovha hafhu wa ḓikumedzela kha zwa maitele re khagala nahone katelaho vhoṱhe itela shandukisa mishumo yawo yoṱhe khathihi na tendelana kha nyanḓano dza zwa mbambadzelano hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dzi fanaho na dza mutakalo ta phimo ya sabusidi ya zwa vhureakhovhe imiswa ha mbambadzo ya zwa makwevho inthanethe na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: The conference also committed to an open and inclusive process to reform all its functions and agreed to package of trade deals addressing areas such as health, setting limits on fishing subsidies moratorium on e-commerce trade and food security     CABINET DECISIONS.
tgt_text: Mvelaphanḓa kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mupfuluwo wa ya kha Khasho ya Didzhithala (BDM).

src_text: Progress on Broadcasting Digital Migration (BDM) Programme.
tgt_text: Khabinethe kha ḓi tou bva wana maswamaswa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya BDM nahone yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho kha dzheniswa ha dzi- set-top box sa tshipiḓa tsha mupfuluwo wa bva kha anaḽogo ya kha khasho ya didzhithala.

src_text: Cabinet received an update on the BDM Programme and noted the progress made with the installation of set-top boxes as part of migrating from analogue to digital broadcasting.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza nḓila ine izwi zwa khunyeledzwa ha BDM zwa vha zwa tshihaḓu ngayo itela vhofholola sipekithiramu tshine tsha ṱoḓea kha zwa vhudavhizani ha ṱhingokhwalwa khathihi na kha miṅwe mishumo elanaho na zwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza mafhungo na vhudavhidzani..  Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhudavhidzani na Thekhinoḽodzhi dza Didzhithala Vho Khumbudzo Ntshavheni vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na vhoramafhungo matshelo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwana itela ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo.

src_text: Cabinet re-emphasised the urgency for concluding the BDM to free up the spectrum needed for mobile broadband, and other information and communications technology related purposes.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka.

src_text: Communications and Digital Technologies Minister Khumbudzo Ntshavheni will hold media briefing tomorrow (Friday, 24 June) to provide more details.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka wa vhuvhili uri anḓadzwe.

src_text: Annual National Child Rights Status Report.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ṋetshedza maswamaswa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Puḽane ya Mashumele ya Lushaka ya Vhana kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2019 swika.

src_text: Cabinet approved the second Annual National Child Rights Status Report to be published.
The report provides an update on the implementation of the National Plan of Action for the Children for the 2019-2024 period..
tgt_text: Muvhigo bvisela khagala mvelaphanḓa yo rekhodiwaho kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2020 swika dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala masia ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu, ane ha katelwa tsireledzo ya vhana khathihi na tshayandingano ine ya khou endelela vhukati ha vhashai na vhapfumi kha vhenevha vhana.

src_text: The report highlights the achievements recorded for the 2020-2021 period.
tgt_text: Muvhigo dovha hafhu wa sumbedzisa nga ha uri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo kwama hani vhana nga tshenetsho tshifhinga..  Maga u dzhenelela ane khou thoma shumiswa nga muvhuso livhiswa kha bveledza pfanelo dza vhana sa zwe dza sumbedziswa zwone kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: It also highlights areas that remain challenge, including the safety of children and the continued disparities between the poor and the rich in respect of children.
tgt_text: Maga aya dovha tikedza vhuḓifhinduleli ha shango kha Thendelano dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Ṅwana dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UNCRC) khathihi na Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo na Mutakalo wa Ṅwana (ACRWC).

src_text: The report also reflects on how the COVID-19 pandemic impacted on children during this period.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi dza UNCRC na ACRWC vhuvhili hadzo..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha vha na vhukwamani na mihasho ya muvhuso khathihi na vhunzhi ha vhashumisani vho teaho bva kha vhuimo ha lushaka ya kha ha mavundu.

src_text: The intervention measures being implemented by government are aimed at realising the rights of children, as outlined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano ine ya vha: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: They also support the country’s obligations to the UN Conventions on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) and the African Charter on the Rights and Welfare of the Child (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo Ṱanganywaho wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Misi nga Misi wo livhiswaho kha UNCRC.

src_text: South Africa is signatory to both the UNCRC and ACRWC.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi kha vha UNCRC.

src_text: The report was compiled in consultation with government departments and number of relevant stakeholders at national and provincial levels.
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu khou vha hone nga murahu ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuvhili we wa ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC nga ṅwaha wa..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa ya nga Tshiteṅwa tsha vhu 44 tsha UNCRC nahone katela mawanwa na themendelo dze dza itwa bva kha muvhigo wa fhedzisela.

src_text: The full report will be posted on the Department of Social Development website: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Vha UNCRC vho rumela mawanwa na themendelo dzavho vha tshi itela shango nga ṅwaha wa..  Nzudzanyo ya muvhigo uyu yo itwa nga murahu ha vhukwamani na mihasho yoṱhe khathihi na vhashumisani vho teaho mona na shango.

src_text: South Africa’s Combined third to sixth Periodic Report to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa musi wo no ranga ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC.

src_text: Cabinet approved the tabling of the third to the sixth Periodic Report to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa lushaka nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhena Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni.

src_text: This report follows the second Periodic Report that was tabled to the UNCRC in..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha muvhigo wa thoma wa lushaka wa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha vha khetheanyo ya Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ya UN (UN-Habitat).

src_text: The report has been compiled in accordance with Article 44 of the UNCRC, and also covers the observations and recommendations made from the last report.
tgt_text: UN-Habitat yo ṱanganedza Adzhenda yayo Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha Muṱangano wayo wa nga ha Dzinnḓu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ha Tshifhinga Tshilapfu nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi.

src_text: The UNCRC sent its observations and recommendations for the country in..
tgt_text: Mashango ane vha miraḓo vha khou lavhelelwa ṋetshedza mivhigo ya nga ha mvelaphanḓa nga one aṋe nga tou funa hao.

src_text: The compilation was done in consultation with all relevant departments and stakeholders across the country.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo tikedza zwa ṱanganedzwa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ḽa dovha hafhu nga tshenetsho tshifhinga ḽa thoma i shumisa nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya Muhanga wa Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni wo Ṱanganelaho (IUDF) wa shango ḽashu.

src_text: The full report will be made public once it has been tabled to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Heyi mbekanyamushumo ya IUDF ndi ine yo livhiswa kha tshimbidza mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha vhupo ha dziḓoroboni vhu katelaho vhoṱhe ha tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone vhune ha dzulea..  Uyu muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na vhukwamani kha masia muvhuso wa lushaka, wa mavundu na muvhuso wapo hu tshi katelwa na dziNGO dzo teaho.

src_text: National report on implementing the New Urban Agenda.
tgt_text: Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Vhaswa yo Ṱanganelaho (IYDS).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of South Africa’s first national report on the Implementation of the New Urban Agenda to the UN Human Settlements Programme (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa thoma shumiswa ha IYDS.

src_text: The UN-Habitat adopted its New Urban Agenda at its Conference on Housing and Sustainable Urban Development in October.
tgt_text: Heyi ndi yone puḽane yo itaho uri hu vhe na Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka ya miṅwaha ya vhukati ha 2020 swika bvisela khagala mishumo, thandela ya mbekanyamushumo dzine dza tea itwa nga vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho bva kha madzangano vhaswa dovha hafhu ya sedza kha zwa fhungudza dovhololwa hu sa fheli ha maga u dzhenelela ha muvhuso khathihi na tsivhudza nga ha nḓila ine tshitshvha na sekhithara dza phuraivethe vha nga tikedza ngayo vhaswa kha uri vha kone swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone.

src_text: Member states were expected to submit progress reports voluntarily.
tgt_text: Nzudzanyo puḽane iyi ndi ine ya katela mihumbulo yo fhambanaho ine ya bva kha sekhithara dza tshitshavha dzo fhambanaho.

src_text: South Africa supported the adoption of the New Urban Agenda and subsequently implemented it through the country’s Integrated Urban Development Framework (IUDF).
tgt_text: Mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The IUDF aims to guide the development of inclusive, resilient and liveable urban settlements.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: The progress report was compiled in consultation with national, provincial and local spheres of government, and relevant NGOs.
tgt_text: Zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe zwi ṋetshedza mutheo wa ndeme wa nyaluwo na mveledziso ya ikonomi nahone ndi zwa ndeme kha matshilo vhathu..   Heyi Nḓivhadzamulayotibe bveledza themendelo dzo itwaho nga Phanele ya Vhaḓivhi vha Maimo Nṱha ye ya tholwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela sengulusa mbekanyamaitele dzashu dzine dza vha hone zwazwino, milayo na maitele nga ha mafhungo elanaho na tshaka dza zwithu zwi tshilaho nga fhambana hazwo..   Muvhigo wo themendela uri hu bveledzwe mbekanyamaitelenyangaredzi ya nga ha ndondolo ya mupo na kushumisele kwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kwa zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa ḽino shango.

src_text: Integrated Youth Development Strategy (IYDS).
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso.

src_text: Cabinet approved the IYDS for implementation.
tgt_text: Ndondolo ya mupo ndi ya ndeme kha fulo ḽa shango ḽa ita hu vhe na nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo nga ṱavhanya.

src_text: The strategy gives effect to the National Youth Policy 2020-.
tgt_text: Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha.

src_text: It outlines the actions, projects and programmes to be undertaken by various stakeholders from youth formations.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: It also deals with minimising the duplication of government interventions and guides how civil society and the private sector can support young people from accessing opportunities.
tgt_text: Puḽane idzi ndi dze dza livhiswa kha ṱoḓa lingedza shandukisa na ita uri nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha vhe yo dzudzanyeaho.

src_text: The compilation of the strategy involved diverse inputs from various sectors of society.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lingedza shela mulenzhe kha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa nga nḓila ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Draft White Paper on Conservation and Sustainable Use of South Africa’s Biodiversity.
tgt_text: Nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha kanzhi ndi nḓowetshumo ine yo ngo dzudzanyea nahone shuma nga nḓila ya zwipiḓapiḓa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the draft White Paper on Conservation and Sustainable Use of South Africa’s Biodiversity for public comments.
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ine ya khou dzinginywa ṋetshedza nḓila dza uri thome shumiswa dzine dza vha dzone dzine dza ḓo ita uri vhe yo dzudzanyeaho khathihi na khwaṱhisa sekhithara sa yone muṋetshedzi wa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa khathihi na vha sekhithara ya nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya nga thusa kha sika zwikhala zwa mishumo  Milayotibe.

src_text: South Africa's biodiversity provides an important basis for economic growth and development, and is critical to people’s livelihoods..
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza ya Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: This White Paper gives effect to the recommendations made by the High-Level Panel of Experts appointed in 2019 to review our current policies, legislation and practices on matters relating to iconic species.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza wa Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamennde itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.

src_text: The report recommended the development of an overarching policy on conservation and sustainable use of the country’s biodiversity.
tgt_text: Khwiṋiso idzi dzo livhiswa kha shandukisa Mulayo wa zwa Sialala na Vhurangaphanḓa ha MaKhoi-San, wa ṅwaha wa 2019 (Mulayo wa vhu3 wa 2019), we wa thoma shuma bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.

src_text: The policy will be implemented across all spheres of government.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa.

src_text: Conservation is important for the country’s drive to accelerate economic growth and job creation.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamenndeni itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.

src_text: Game Meat Strategy.
tgt_text: Musi wo no ṱanganedzwa, Mulayotibe ḓo shandukisa Mulayo wa Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi ya Ndayotewa Kha Vhuthororisi na Zwi elanao nadzo, 2002 (Mulayo wa vhu 22 wa 2004).

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Game Meat Strategy for public comments.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu wo fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na tshitshavha angalalaho nga murahu ha musi wo ṱanganedzwa nga khabinethe nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.

src_text: The strategy seeks to formalise and transform the game meat industry.
tgt_text: Tshanduko idzi ndi dzine dza khou ḓo lingedza ita uri hu vhe na elana vhukati ha zwishumiswa zwa fhano hayani zwa lwa na zwiito zwa vhutherorisi na maga ḽifhasi a vhetshelwa lwa na zwiito zwenezwo.

src_text: It also seeks to contribute towards food security in sustainable manner.
tgt_text: Tshanduko idzi dzo dovha hafhu dza sedza kha zwiteṅwa zwe zwa wanala zwi sa elani na ndayotewa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa.

src_text: The game meat industry is predominately an informal industry that operates in fragmented manner.
tgt_text: Sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho thendelano dza Khoro ya Tsireledzo ya UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kombetshedzea shumisa milayo ya mashangoḓavha ine ya lingedza khwaṱhisa maga u fhelisa vhutherorisi ha ḽifhasi nga angaredza   Vhuṱambo vhu ḓaho.

src_text: The proposed strategy provides an implementation plan that will formalise and strengthen the sector as both provider of food security and an economic growth sector that can help create job opportunities     BILLS.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa vhu14 wa mashango Brazili, Russia, India, China na Afrika Tshipembe (BRICS).

src_text: Traditional Affairs General Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ranga phanḓa shela mulenzhe ha Afrika Tshipembe kha Muṱangano wa Vharaphanḓa vha mashango BRICS wa vhu14 une wa ḓo farwa nga vidio ye ya tshimbidzwa nga vha muvhuso wa vhathu wa Riphabuḽiki ya China bva nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 23 swika nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Traditional Affairs General Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
The amendments seek to revise the Traditional and Khoi-San Leadership Act, 2019 (Act 3 of 2019), which came into effect on 1 April.
tgt_text: Zwa vha hashu muraḓo wa BRICS zwi khou bvela phanḓa na vhuedza shango ḽashu.

src_text: Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho 17% ya thundu dzi vhambadzelwaho nnḓa dza Afrika Tshipembe dzo livhiswa kha mashango BRICS, ngeno 29% ya zwiṱunḓwa zwashu nga angaredza zwo vha zwi tshi bva kha mashango aya.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ndeme ya mbambadzo iyi khou bvela phanḓa na engedzea lwe thanganyelo ya mbambadzo yoṱhe ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango BRICS ya swika henefha kha R702 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021, zwine zwa vha engedzea bva kha R487 biḽioni ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Once adopted, the Bill will amend the current Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Act, 2004 (Act 33 of 2004).
The Bill went through an extensive public consultation process after it was approved by Cabinet in May.
tgt_text: Tshumisano vhukati ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya BRICS kha masia fhambanaho fana na mutakalo na khathihi na mbambadzo yo engedzeaho yo ita uri hu vhe na nyaluwo kha nḓowetshumo yashu yapo ya dovha ya ita uri hu vhe na vhuelwa kha miraḓo yoṱhe ya BRICS.

src_text: The amendments seek to align the country’s domestic instruments of fighting terrorism with the global measures that have been put in place.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi hashu kha thandela dza mveledziso ya themamveledziso khathihi na nungo dzashu dza fhungudza vhukonḓi ha musi hu tshi itwa zwa mabindu ndi zwithu zwo livhiswaho kha lingedza engedza mbambadzelannḓa ya kha vhashumisani na riṋe vha BRICS.

src_text: They have also addressed the clauses that were deemed unconstitutional by the Constitutional Court.
tgt_text: Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi tsha Vhuriha.

src_text: As signatory to the UN Security Council, South Africa is duty-bound to domesticate the international laws that seek to strengthen measures to combat global terrorism     UPCOMING EVENTS.
tgt_text: Tshikolo tsha zwa Mavhusele tsha Lushaka (NSG) tshi ḓo vha na vhuṱambo ha vhuraru ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi hu tshi itela Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa Polotiki ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 27 Fulwi swika nga ḽa 1 Fulwana.

src_text: 14th Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa (BRICS) Summit.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uho vhu ḓo dzhenelwa nga Dziminisṱa bva kha mashango ngaho Côte d'Ivoire, South Sudan na Afrika Tshipembe; hu tshi katelwa na vhalangivhahulu vha bvaho ngei Lesotho, Zambia, Riphabuḽiki ya Congo (DRC), Tanzania na Ghana.

src_text: President Ramaphosa will lead South Africa’s participation in the virtual 14th BRICS Leaders’ Summit hosted by the People’s Republic of China from Thursday, 23 to Friday, 24 June.
tgt_text: Vhoṋeḓorobo vha Afrika Tshipembe, khathihi na miraḓo ya komiti dza vhoṋeḓorobo na khorotshitumbe dza hone, na vhone vha ḓo dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu..  Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa politiki bva kha mashango fhambanaho na vhone vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ḓo kovhana mihumbulo na ngudo dzi bvaho kha nyimele dzo fhambanaho dze vha ṱangana nadzo kha mishumo yavho ya ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

NSG yo dzudzanya mbekanyamushumo ya ṅwaha hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe nga ṅwaha wa 2020, sa tshipiḓa tsha thikhedzo yayo kha zwa vhuḓikumedzeli ha muvhuso ha fhaṱa shango ḽine ḽa khou shumaho zwavhuḓi dovha hafhu ya lingedza shomedza miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe kha masia mararu muvhuso nga vhurangaphanḓa ho khwaṱhaho na vhukoni ha zwa vhulavhelesi itela uri vha kone ṱola hafhu khaedu dza zwa mavhusele dzine dza khakhisa maitele zwa katelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Our BRICS membership   continues to benefit the country.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela.

src_text: Last year over 17 percent of South Africa’s exports were destined to other BRICS countries, and over 29 percent of our total imports came from these countries.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela ḽa houno ṅwaha ḽine ḽa ḓo vha nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 18 Fulwana 2022 ḽi ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe ine ya ri: “Kha vha ite zwine vha nga kona nga zwine vha vha nazwo, henefho hune vha vha hone” tou vha khuwelelo re khagala ya uri vhathu vha tikedze khathihi na shela mulenzhe kha fulo iḽi nga ṋetshedza maga u dzhenelela tshifhinga tshilapfu ane ḓo fhedza nga vha na zwivhuya zwi sa gumi.

src_text: The value of this trade continues to grow, with total South African trade with other BRICS countries reaching R702 billion in 2021, up from R487 billion in.
tgt_text: Maṅwe maga u dzhenelela ane nga vha tshifhinga tshilapfu ndi Mbekanyamushumo ya Nyambedzano dza Vhaswa ya Vho Nelson Mandela na Vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na Mikhwa ine yo sedzesa kha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme zwi kwamaho vhaswa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na mona na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe.
Khalaṅwaha ya Muthelo.

src_text: Collaboration within BRICS members in various areas such as health and enhanced trade has grown our local industry, and benefited all BRICS members.
tgt_text: Khalaṅwaha ya rumela muthelo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ḓo vula bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwana swika 24 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Our investment in infrastructure development projects and efforts to reduce red tape when doing business aim to increase exports to our BRICS partners.
tgt_text: Vhatheli vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa rumela maṅwalo avho zwa mithelo kha eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kana kha MobiApp ya vha Tshumelo dza Mbuelo dza Afrika Tshipembe (SARS..   Uno ṅwaha SARS ḓo bvela phanḓa na tsenguluso dza zwa muthelo dzine dza tou dzula dzo itwa nga khomphiyutha dza mutheli muṅwe na muṅwe, hedzi ndi fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo dzine dza dzula dzo ḓadziwa itela leludza maitele u rumela fomo dza muthelo.

src_text: Economic Governance Winter School.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021 vhatheli vha fhiraho miḽioni tharu vho swika he vha senguluswa nga nḓila yeneyi ine fomo dzavho dza dzula dzo ḓadzwa nga khomphiyutha.

src_text: The National School of Government (NSG) will host its third Economic Governance Winter School Programme for Political Executives in Johannesburg from 27 June to 1 July.
tgt_text: Zwa rumela fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo nga tshifhinga nahone dzo dzudzanyea nga nḓila yo teaho zwi tou ita fhedzi uri mutheli wanale tshi khou tevhedza milayo yo teaho ya zwa muthelo, zwi dovha hafhu zwa thusa muvhuso kha ṋetshedza tshumelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha dzi ṱoḓesa  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe khou rumela milaedza ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Muhaṱuli Vho Owen Lloyd Rogers nga murahu ha tholwa havho sa Muhaṱuli wa Khothe ya Ndayotewa ya Afrika Tshipembe.Khabinethe khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khou rumela mulaedza wa tamela Phresidennde wa kale Vho Thabo Mbeki Ḓuvha Ḽavhuḓi ḽa Mabebo musi vha tshi khou fara miṅwaha ya 80, ḽe vha ḽi pembelela nga ḽa 18 Fulwana.

src_text: It will be attended by Ministers from Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan and South Africa; and Directors-General from Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania and Ghana.
tgt_text: Vho Mbeki vho vha na bono ḽa vhumatshelo havhuḓi nahone ha mvelaphanḓa kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: South African mayors, as well as members of mayoral committees and executive councils, will also attend..
tgt_text: Vhalangi vhane vha si vhe miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe vha Bodo ya Maanḓalanga Ndangulo ya zwa Vhufhufhi ha Muyani ya AfrikaTshipembe:Vho Ernest Khosa;Mufumakadzi Vho Bulelwa Koyana;Vho Surendra Sooklal; naMufumakadzi Vho Rejoice Edith Phewa..  Miraḓo ya Ofisi ya bula Zwikolodo zwa DzinnḓuMufumakadzi Vho Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Catharina Maria Van der Sandt;Vho Errol Vincent Magerman;Muimeleli Vho Mandla Dludlu;Vho Matsobane Gabriel Mello;Mufumakadzi Vho Palesa Mawasha;Mufumakadzi Vho Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton;Mufumakadzi Vho Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga;Vho Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; andVho Zuko Ncemane.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

src_text: Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha nanga haelwa khathihi na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi khou ita uri shango ḽi kone fhelisa zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwiswa zwa kavhiwa nga tshifhinga tsha luṱa lwa vhuṱanu lwa dwadze iḽi.

src_text: Cabinet commended all people in South Africa who chose to vaccinate and observe all COVID-19 protocols that resulted in the country averting rising numbers of new cases during the fifth wave of the pandemic..
However, we must not be complacent as COVID-19 is still in our midst.
tgt_text: Naho zwo ralo ri tei ḓikanganyisa sa izwi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshi kha ḓi tou vha hone tshoṱhe henefha vhukati hashu.

src_text: Although the country recently scrapped the compulsory wearing of masks in public, people with comorbidities and those who are ill are encouraged to continue wearing mask.
tgt_text: Naho hu na uri shango ḽi kha ḓi tou bva fhelisa zwa ambara maski nga khombekhombe musi muthu fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi, vhathu vhane vha vha na maṅwe malawadze nga thungo hu tshi katelwa na avho vhane vha khou lwala, vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha bvele phanḓa na ambara maski yavho.

src_text: We must also continue to wash or sanitise our hands, and observe social distancing and proper ventilation.
tgt_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na ṱamba kana sanithaiza zwanḓa zwashu sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati hashu na vhaṅwe vhathu khathihi na vhona uri fhethu hune ra vha hone hu khou dzhena muya nga nḓila yo teaho.

src_text: Vaccination remains the scientifically proven defence against COVID-19 and Cabinet encourages all unvaccinated people to vaccinate without delay and vaccinated people to get their booster shots at their nearest vaccination sites, for free..  Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha wone philelo yo khwaṱhisedzwaho nga vhorasaintsi ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nahone Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ye vha haelwe hu si na tshilengo khathihi na uri vhathu vho haelwaho vha tea wana dziṅwe khaelo dzavho dza khwaṱhisedza henefho kha vhupo ha muhaelo vhu re tsinisa navho nga mahala.

src_text: Cabinet was updated on the latest developments in the spread of Monkeypox disease in the country following the recent confirmation of second case in the country.
The affected persons are isolating at home and contact tracing is being conducted to detect others who may have been exposed..
tgt_text: Maruḓa ṱhoho.

src_text: The Department of Health and the National Institute for Communicable Diseases are collaborating with the World Health Organisation to assess the risk for local transmission in line with the International Health Regulations..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedzwa zwidodombedzwa zwiswa nga ha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha phanḓalala ha vhulwadze ha Maruḓa ṱhoho fhano shangoni nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha zwenezwino ha tshiwo tsha vhuvhili tsha vhulwadze uvhu fhano shangoni.

src_text: The monkeypox virus is not easily spread and usually only occurs after close contact such as kissing, cuddling or touching parts of the body with monkeypox lesions.
tgt_text: Vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga vhulwadze uvhu vha khou khethelwa thungo na vhaṅwe vhathu henefho mahayani avho nahone hu khou dovha hafhu ha ṱoḓuluswa na avho vhe vha vha na vhukwamani navho itela wanulusa vhaṅwe vhane na vhone vha nga vha vho swika he vha pfukelwa nga vhulwadze uvhu..     Vha Muhasho wa Mutakalo na vha Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka vha khou vha na tshumisano na vha Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi itela ita ṱhoḓisiso nga ha khombo ya pfukiselwa ha vhulwadze uvhu fhano hayani hu tshi tevhedzwa Milayo ya zwa Mutakalo ya Dzitshaka.

src_text: People without monkeypox symptoms cannot spread the virus to others..
tgt_text: Vairasi ya maruḓa ṱhoho i tou phaḓalala nga tou ralo nahone kanzhi pfukela nga murahu ha musi ho vha na vhukwamani ha tsinisa vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili fana na mamana kuvhatedzana kana farafara zwipiḓa zwa muvhili zwine zwa vha na dzintho dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho.

src_text: Cabinet advised people who experience symptoms of fever, general flu-like signs, followed by blister-like rash to report to their nearest healthcare facility for early detection and treatment..  East London tavern tragedy.
tgt_text: Vhathu vhane vha si vhe na tsumbadwadze dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho vha nga si swike hune vha nga phaḓaladza vairasi yeneyo kha vhaṅwe vhathu..     Khabinethe yo eletshedza vhathu vhane vha vha na tsumbadwadze dzi fanaho na mutetemelo, tsumbo dzi fanaho na mukhushwane nga angaredza dzine dza tevhelwa nga munyavhili une wa fana na mapone uri vha ḓivhonadze kha tshiimiswa tsha ndondolamutakalo tshi re tsinisa na ha havho itela uri vha kone ṱolwa khathihi na ilafhwa.

src_text: The devastating tragedy at the Enyobeni Tavern in East London in the Eastern Cape on Sunday, 26 June 2022 that claimed the lives of 21 teenagers, has shattered our entire country.
It is hard to imagine the anguish of families who lost their children in such tragic manner..
tgt_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela thaveni ya fhaḽa East London.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its condolences to the families who lost their loved ones and thanked everyone for their humanitarian support to the grieving families during this difficult time..
tgt_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu shushaho vhukuma tshe tsha bvelela Thaveni ya Enyobeni ine ya vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya East London vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 26 Fulwi 2022 he khatsho ha lovha vhaswa vha swikaho 21, tsho shusha shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: It is concerning that children as young as 13 were allowed to enter the venue and consume alcohol.
tgt_text: Zwi konḓa vhukuma lingedza humbula nga ha vhuṱungu vhune vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhana nga nḓila yeneyi ya makhaulambilu ngaurali vha khou vhu pfa..     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhayo ya dovha hafhu ya livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe kha thikhedzo yavho ya zwa vhuthu ye vha ṋetshedza kha miṱa iyi ine ya khou lila nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tshi konḓaho ngaurali zwi pfasesei zwavhuḓi uri ndi ngani fhethu afho ho vha ho tendelwa na vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 13 uri vha dzhene vha nwe mahalwa.

src_text: We call on communities to play their part in keeping our children safe at all times..  Children under the age of 18 are not allowed to enter taverns, shebeens, pubs and bottle stores.
tgt_text: Ri khou ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha zwoṱhe ya uri zwi shele mulenzhe kha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea misi yoṱhe.

src_text: Liquor traders who are found to be contravening any of these laws must be criminally charged and have their operating licences revoked.

tgt_text: Vhana vha miṅwaha re fhasi ha 18 vho ngo tendelwa dzhena ngomu dzithaveni, zwipotoni, phabuni na mavhengeleni u rengisa mahalwa.

src_text: Outcomes from the Group of Seven (G7) Leaders’ Summit.
tgt_text: Vharengisi vha mahalwa vhane vha ḓo wanala vha tshi khou pfuka muṅwe wa iyo milayo vha tea farelwa mulandu wa vhugevhenga nahone ha dovha ha dzhiwa na ṱhanziela dzavho dza rengisa.

src_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa participated in the G7 Leaders’ Summit which took place in Bavaria, Germany on Monday, 27 June.
The President – who participated in working sessions where climate, energy, health, global food security and gender equality issues were discussed – was invited by the host, Chancellor Olaf Scholz..
tgt_text: Mvelelo dza Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7).

src_text: The G7 is an intergovernmental political forum consisting of Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom and the United States  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho shela mulenzhe kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7) we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Bavaria, kha ḽa Germany nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 27 Fulwi.

src_text: Draft Legal Sector Code (Draft LSC).
tgt_text: Phresidennde – vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha madzulo u shuma he khaho ha vha hu tshi khou ambiwa nga mafhungo kwamaho kilima, fulufulu, mutakalo, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe nga angaredza khathihi na mafhungo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, vho vha vho rambiwa nga murangaphanḓa wa shango ḽe vhuṱambo uvhu ha vha ho farelwa khaḽo, Mutshantseḽara Vho Olaf Scholz..     Muṱangano uyu wa G7 ndi foramu ya zwa polotiki ya vhukati ha mashango ngaho Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom na ḽa United States     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Draft LSC for public comment.
tgt_text: Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC).

src_text: The objectives of these codes are to facilitate the transformation of the legal sector to achieve representation as per the country’s demographics.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha.

src_text: The code will also ensure the development of the body that will produce well-trained and competent providers of legal services.
tgt_text: Zwipikwa zwa idzi khoudu ndi ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya sekhithara ya zwa mulayo itela swikela zwa imelelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe ya nga mirafho ya vhathu vha ḽino shango.

src_text: The development of the Draft LSC was overseen by the Legal Practice Council statutory body established in terms of Section 4 of the Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Act 28 of 2014) and guided by the Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment Act (B-BBEE), 2013 (Act 46 of 2013).
tgt_text: Khoudu iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mveledziso ya tshiimiswa tshine tsha ḓo bveledza vhaṋetshedzi vha tshumelo dza zwa mulayo vho pfumbudzwaho nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone vha re na vhukoni.

src_text: The B-BBEE Act of 2013 provides for the Minister of Trade, Industry and Competition to issue codes of good practice on black economic empowerment in the specific sectors.
Members of the legal profession currently do not have sector code to guide them in addressing the imbalances and inequalities in the legal profession.
tgt_text: Zwa bveledzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) zwo vha zwo rangwa phanḓa nga vha Khoro ya Maitele zwa Mulayo, ine ya vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa mulayo tshe tsha vhumbwa hu tshi tevhedzwa Khethekanyo 4 ya Mulayo wa Maitele zwa Mulayo, wa 2014 (Mulayo 28 wa 2014) ya dovha ya ṱuṱuwedzwa nga Mulayo wa Maanḓafhadzwa ha Vharema ho Angalalaho kha zwa Ikonimi (B-BBEE), wa 2013 (Mulayo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: The Draft LSC will be published in the Government Gazette for 60 days to allow for public comments..  Biannual performance progress reports.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa B-BBEE wa 2013 na mbetshelwa ya uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano vha kone ṋetshedza khoudu dza maitele avhuḓi dza nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema kha zwa ikonomi kha sekhithara dzo teaho.

src_text: Cabinet approved the biannual performance progress reports for the period covering October 2021 to March.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo swika zwino vha athu vha na khoudu ya sekhithara ine ya vha yone ine ya vha eletshedza kha zwa tandulula thaidzo dza sa eḓana na tshayandingano kha buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo.

src_text: The reports form part of the Medium Term Strategic Framework (MTSF) 2019-.
The MTSF 2019-2024 is the implementation plan and monitoring framework for achieving the National Development Plan: Vision 2030 priorities for the sixth administration of government.
tgt_text: Heyi Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) ḓo anḓadzwa kha Gurannḓa ya Muvhuso lwa maḓuvha 60 itela uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi..     Muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya mashumele ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: The reports focused on the seven priorities of government, namely (1) Economic transformation and job creation; (2) Education, skills and health; (3) Consolidating the social wage through reliable and quality basic services; (4) Spatial integration, human settlements and local government; (5) Social cohesion and safe communities; (6) capable, ethical and developmental state; and (7) better Africa and world, and related interventions of the sixth administration..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ya tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021 swika Shundunthule.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed areas of progress on the determined targets for the period under review.
tgt_text: Mivhigo iyi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha Muhanga wa Puḽane dza Tshifhinga tsha Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTSF) wa bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Cabinet also noted areas that required interventions so as to address delays which were negatively impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic..   inisters will hold media briefings in the coming weeks to unpack their respective reports and elaborate on areas where performance needs to be strengthened  Upcoming Event.
tgt_text: MTSF dza tshifhinga tsha bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa 2024 ndi dzone puḽane dza shuma khathihi na muhanga wa vhulavhelesi hu tshi itelwa swikela Puḽane ya mveledziso ya Lushaka: Zwipikwa zwa Bono ḽa 2030 zwa ndangulo ya muvhuso wa vhurathi.

src_text: Black Industrialist and Exporters Conference (BIEC).
tgt_text: Mivhigo yo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha zwipikwa zwa sumbe zwa muvhuso, zwine zwa vha (1) Tshanduko ya Ikonomi na sikwa ha mishumo; (2) Pfunzo, zwikili na mutakalo; (3) khwaṱhisa muholo wa zwa matshilisano nga shumisa tshumelo dza fhasisa dzine dza vha dza maimo nṱha nahone dzi fulufhedzeaho; (4) ṱanganywa ha fhethu, vhudzulo ha vhathu na muvhuso wapo; (5) Vhuthihi ha vhadzulapo na zwitshavha zwo tsireledzeaho; (6) shango ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni, maitele mikhwa yavhuḓi na mvelaphanḓa; khathihi na (7) Afrika ḽa khwinesa hu tshi katelwa na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe khathihi na dzhenelela ho teaho ha ndangulo ya muvhuso ya vhurathi..     Khabinethe yo dovha ya ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwipikwa zwo tiwaho zwa tshifhinga tshine tsha vha nga fhasi ha tsenguluso.

src_text: An inaugural BIEC  will  be held at the Sandton International Convention Centre in Johannesburg on Wednesday, 20 July.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha na afho hune ha kha ḓi vha na ṱhoḓea ya dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo ya tshilengo tshe tsha vha hone nga mulandu wa ṱaha ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: The conference follows the launch earlier this year of the Black Industrialists Export Network by government, which supports black industrialists to break into new markets, and access export finance and marketing avenues  Message.
tgt_text: Dziminisṱa vha ḓo fara miṱangano na vhoramafhungo kha vhege dzi si gathi dzi ḓaho itela bvisela khagala mivhigo yavho nga fhambana hayo khathihi na ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwi elanaho na afho hune ha vha hu tshi khou tea khwaṱhiswa mashumele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: the Springboks, for thrilling last-minute victory over Wales during the first of three test matches at the Loftus Versveld Stadium in Pretoria on Saturday, 2 July.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Vhoranḓowetshumo khathihi na Vhavhambadzelannḓa vha Vharema (BIEC).

src_text: Banyana Banyana, for their 2-1 victory in their opening Women’s Africa Cup of Nations match against Nigeria, hosted by Morocco, on Monday, 4 July  AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearance.
tgt_text: BIEC ya tou thoma ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Dzitshaka ine ya vha fhaḽa Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 20 Fulwana.

src_text: Dr Nyameko Barney Pityana as the Chairperson of the National Lotteries Commission..  Adv Rory Voller as the Commissioner for the Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.
Energy.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga a ḓivhadzwa nga muvhuso u tandulula thaidzo dza fulufulu dzine shango ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.

src_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.
tgt_text: Maga aya angalalaho ngaurali ndi one ane ḓo vula nḓila dza fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi shandukisa sekithara ya muḓagasi khathihi na swikela zwa nḓisedzo ya fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..
Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.
tgt_text: Sa ndingedzo dzashu dza tikedza netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi khathihi na thusa shango ḽashu kha vhuleme vhune ḽa khou ṱangana naho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, ri tea fhungudza tshivhalo tsha muḓagasi une shango ḽashu ḽa shumisa nga megawati dza 600 kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miraru ḓaho..
