Miṱa nga shela mulenzhe kha vhulunga fulufulu nga dzima zwishumiswa zwoṱhe zwo fungwaho zwine zwa si vhe zwa ndeme khathihi na izwo zwi shumisesaho fulufulu nga zwifhinga zwa musi hu na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya muḓagasi.

src_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.
Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa Vulindlela.

src_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho nga fhasi ha Fulo ḽa Vulindlela ḽo livhiswaho kha fhelisa vhukonḓi vhune ha vha hone kha sekhithara dza zwa fulufulu, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo, maḓi na zwa vhuendelamashango hu tshi itelwa vusulusa ikonomi.

src_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Ho no swikelwa tshandukiso dza zwa milayo dza ṱahe kha dza 26, hune dziṅwe tshandukiso dza milayo dzi swikaho 11 dza khou vhonala hu tshi khou vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi khadzo.

src_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Magundo no swikelwaho ndi ane katela zwa engedzwa ha vhuhulwane ha ḽaisentsi dza bveledza muḓagasi une wa ḓo dzheniswa kha netiweke khulwane ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, zwa shandukiswa ha khamphani ya muvhuso ya Maanḓalanga Vhuimangalavha ha Lushaka ya Transnet ya kha vha khamphani ya zwa makwevho yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe phaḓaladzwa ha mutevhe wo shandukiswaho wa zwikili zwa ndeme khathihi na thoma shumiswa ha sisteme ya e-Visa kha mashango 14, hu tshi katelwa na mimaraga miswa mihulwane ya zwa vhuendelamashango sa shango ḽa China, India, Kenya na Nigeria..   Khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF).

src_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedza vhaiswa nga zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu zwa tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi vha malo zwine zwa kha ḓi tou bva itea ngei Krugersdorp kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..
tgt_text: Hezwi zwiito zwivhi ngaurali khathihi na tambudzwa ha vhafumakadzi ndi zwine zwa khakhisa vhudziki na vhuthihi vhune ha vha hone zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fhululedza vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha fara nga ṱavhanya vhunzhi ha vhahumbulelwa kha vhugevhenga uvhu ha tshiṱuhu ngaurali..   Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha ya uri zwi shumisane na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo nga kovhana navho mafhungo maṅwe na maṅwe kana vhiga zwiito zwi soliseaho.

src_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.
tgt_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu zwi vhe fhethu ho tsireledzeaho kha vhana na vhafumakadzi..   Mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa Afrika Tshipembe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha lwa na vhaiti vha zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi nga fhasi ha mulayo.

src_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .
tgt_text: Kha vha vhige zwiwo zwoṱhe zwine zwa elana na GBVF kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tshi re tsini navho kana vha tou founela kha nomboro ya mahala ya Fhelisa Zwiito zwa Vhugevhenga ya: 0860 01 0111, Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiito zwa GBVF ya Lushaka kha: 0800 428 428 kana kha Nomboro ya Luṱingo ya Thuso ya Fhelisa Khakhathi dza zwa Mbeu ya: 0800 150. .

src_text: Women’s Month.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi.

src_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi une wa pembelelwa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule ndi une khawo ha fhululedzwa vhafumakadzi vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha nndwa ya mbofholowo khathihi na vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vhoṱhe zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..
The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi wa ṋaṅwaha ndi une wa khou fhululedzwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Pfanelo dza Vhafumakadzi kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi khathihi na Maanḓafhadzwa Fhaṱa hafhu nga nḓila ya Khwine hu tshi itelwa Konḓelela ho Khwinifhadzeaho ha Vhafumakadzi”..   Vhafumakadzi vha fhiraho 20 000 vhe vha gwalaba vho livha ngei Union Buildings, ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule 1956 vho shela mulenzhe kha ita uri zwa ndinganyiselo nga mbeu na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi zwi dzulele vha tshone tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso wa demokirasi wa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.

tgt_text: Maga aya vhuhali vhafumakadzi avha vha dzhia ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi nga angaredza uri na vhone vha ḓiwane vha tshi khou dzhia maimo nṱha Phaḽamenndeni, kha muvhuso na ngomu kha zwitshavha zwa havho nahone rikhou bvela phanḓa na khwaṱhisa mvelaphanḓa iyi tou bva tshe ra wana mbofholowo nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Marikana commemoration.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha Marikana.

src_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.
tgt_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Ṱhangule 2022, muvhuso khathihi na shango ḽoṱhe nga angaredza wo vha na ḓuvha ḽa humbula nga ha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa Marikana kha ḽa North West nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..
tgt_text: Vhuṱungu he vhashumi vha vhu pfa, miṱa yavho khathihi na lushaka nga angaredza vhu ḓo dzulela vha tshipiḓa tsha ḓivhazwakale yashu swikela zwenezwo.

src_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.

Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Mvusuluso ya Marikana yo no thoma shuma itela fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi itela khwinisa matshilo zwitshavha zwa fhaḽa Marikana.

src_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.
tgt_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho, muvhuso wo badela masheleni ndiliso linganaho R176 miḽioni kha miṱa ya zwipondwa ngeno hu na uri milandu yo salaho ine ya kha ḓi vha khothe tshi khou lavhelelwa khunyeledzwa mafheloni ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ho vha na nnḓu dza tshivhalo ntswa kana dze dza tou vusuluswa dze dza ṋetshedzwa kha tshilikadzi dza fhaḽa Marikana ngeno hu na dziṅwe dzine dza ḓo fhela fhaṱwa uno ṅwaha.

src_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..
tgt_text: Thandela ya zwa dzinnḓu ya masheleni linganaho R700 miḽioni ḓo ita uri vhashumi vha migodini vha kone ṋetshedzwa madzulo khwine.

src_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.
tgt_text: Hu khou ṋetshedzwa hafhu na themamveledziso ya zwa matshilisano ya ndeme ine ya ḓo thusa kha khwinifhadza nyimele dza kutshilele kwa zwitshavha zwa vhupo vhune ha vha na zwa migodi.

src_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..
The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM) kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Imbizo dza Phresidennde dza nga ha DDM tharu dzo fhiraho dze dza farelwa fhaḽa North West, Free State na Mpumalanga nga fhambana hadzo, Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng re kha ḽa Gauteng wone wo fara imbizo yawo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 12 Ṱhangule..   Nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A huna tsaleli”, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa ha vhaofisiri vhahulwane vha bvaho kha mivhuso yapo, wa vunḓu na wa lushaka.

Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwiimiswa na sekhithara dzavho dzo fhambanaho, vho swika he vha kuvhangana vha tshi itela uri vha kone lwa na engedzea ha tshikalo tsha vhushai khathihi na vhuheḓana vhune ha khou vhangwa nga nyimele dzine dza si vhe dzavhuḓi dza ikonomi.

src_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..
tgt_text: Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng tsho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya ita uri Vhupo ha Ikonomi yo Khetheaho ha Vaal River (SEZ) vhu kone shuma, vhune ha vha vhupo vhu re na khonadzeo khulwane ya ita uri dzingu iḽi, vunḓu kana shango ḽi dovhe hafhu vha fhethu hune khaho ha nga itwa zwa nḓowetshumo.

src_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..
tgt_text: SEZ ya fhaḽa Vaal River khou dzudzanya uri hu vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo vha na sekhithara dza ndeme dzi tevhelaho: Vaal River Smart City ntswa; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight khathihi na sekhithara yo vusuluswaho ya bveledza tsimbi.

src_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.
Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.
tgt_text: 1   Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde we wa farelwa fhaḽa Ekurhuleni, kha ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 4 swikela ḽa 5 Ṱhangule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱuṱuwedza Vhuthihi ha zwa Matshilisano hu tshi Itelwa Shela Mulenzhe kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi nga Zwitshavha”, wo ṱanganya vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho bva kha masia fhambanaho itela uri vha shumisane na muvhuso muhumbulo muhulwane wa tandulula khaedu dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi khathihi na kuvhanganya zwishumiswa zwo teaho hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya zwitshavha..    Muṱangano wo dzhiela nṱha mivhigo ya nyambedzano bva kha mavunḓu ṱahe ine ya amba nga ha khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo, dzi katelaho swikela masheleni, mafhungo zwa milayo, tshandukiso ya sekhithara ya zwa matshilisano muhumbulo wa ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka ha tshumisano vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa tandulula khaedu dzi elanaho na vhushai, tshayandingano na shayea ha mishumo.

src_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na vhadzulapo ya uri vha shele mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha ita uri ri kone fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine, sa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa kha Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka: Bono ḽa   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki.

src_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo sedzesa kha zwa vhutsila ha vhona nga maṱo, vhuvhaḓi na nyolo, ha vhona nga maṱo na thetshelesa nga nḓevhe khathihi na nyanḓadzamafhungo dza vhukati ha vhavhili; nyolo na tshumelo dza zwa vhusiki, mabepha na minyanya hu tshi katelwa na muzika, nyanḓadzamafhungo dza nyanḓadzo na khanḓiso.

src_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi ḓo dzhenelela kha sekhithara dzenedzi ho livhiwa kha fhaṱa sekhithara ya zwa vhusiki yo shandukiswaho ine ya dzhielwa nṱha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nahone ya dovha ya vha ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini ḓo dovha hafhu ya shuma yo livha kha ita uri nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhusiki ya Afrika Tshipembe kone swikela mimaraga yapo na ya dzitshaka.

src_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.
The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khwinifhadzwa ha Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.

src_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).
tgt_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi kanzhi ndi dze dza itwa kha khethekanyo ya zwa khadzimiso ya uno muhanga.

src_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Dziṅwe dza khwinifhadzo dzine dza khou dzinginywa ndi ḓivhadzwa ha tshifhinga tsha khadzimiso dza masheleni dza tshifhinga tshilapfu tshine tsha ḓo elana na tshifhinga tsha shumisea ha dziṅwe dza ndaka dzenedzo dzine dza khou avhelwa masheleni ayo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso kha sia ḽa zwa khadzimiso dza masheleni dza mimasipala..   Khethekanyo 230 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 maanḓafhadza mimasipala uri ite khadzimiso dza masheleni hu tshi itelwa uri kone engedza masheleni ayo ane ya shumisa kha londa ndaka dzayo kana ane shumiswa kha mbadelo dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

src_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa thoma wo tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋea ṱhalutshedzo kha Ndima ya 6 na ya 13 ya Mulayo wa zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwinifhadzo dzo tendelwaho ndi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhahadzimisi vhanzhi vhane vha hadzimisa mimasipala masheleni fhedzi dzi ḓo ḓi bvela phanḓa na tevhedza maitele ndeme ane langa khadzimiso dza ha masipala.

src_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.
Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dze dza rekhodiwa nga kotara ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.

src_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa ha ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.

src_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara.

src_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo vha itela shandukisa maitele kale mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga fhano shangoni dza vha dzi tshi bviswa nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.
tgt_text: oyu ṅwedzi une wa ḓo rangela bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga une wa khou dzinginywa ndi wa Ṱhangule 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya thoma na ṅwedzi wa Ḽara 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya vhuvhili.

src_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara ya vhuraru na kotara ya vhuṋa dzi ḓo bviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi na wa Shundunthule 2023 nga fhambana hazwo fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD).

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tshe tsha vha tsho ḓivhadzwa nga murahu ha miḓalo tshinyadzaho ye ya vha hone ngei vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha na ḽa KwaZulu-Natal..   Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tsho fhelelwa nga tshifhinga nga ḽa 18 Ṱhangule 2022 nga murahu ha musi tsho swika he tsha engedzwa nga ḽa 18 Fulwi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.
tgt_text: Uhu engedzwa ha tshifhinga ho vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho ranga dzhielwa nṱha ṱhoḓea ya bvela phanḓa na engedza maga tshiimo tsha shishi ane vha hone zwazwino ane khou dzhiiwa nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso itela fhelisa na tandulula masiandaitwa mutsho wo kalulaho kha mavunḓu kwameaho.

src_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tenda zwauri nyimele ine ya vha hone zwazwino i tsha ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na maga songo ḓowelelaho sa izwi zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na vhadzulapo zwi tshi ḓo bvela phanḓa na ita uri hu vhe na ṱhaḓulo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa, mbuedzedzo na phaṱhululo    ilayotibe.

src_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa 2020 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri sedzuluswe hafhu.

src_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza uyu Mulayotibe nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na tshitshavha khwinifhadzwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu ḓo ita uri hu kone swikelwa zwa vhuṋe ha mavu ho tsireledzeaho ya nga mulayo kha Khethekanyo 25(6) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza kuvhanganywa ha mbalombalo ya nga murafho, mbeu, lushaka na vhudzulapo ha muthu onoyo ane vha na pfanelo dza zwa mavu fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.
tgt_text: Hedzi mbetshelwa dzi ḓo ita uri hu vhe na mivhigo ya muvhalelano wa zwa mavu ine ya vha ya vhukuma khathihi na ṱhoḓisiso dza tshifhinga tshi ḓaho dzine dza elana na zwa shandukiswa ha vhuṋe ha mavu.

src_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi ḽa Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa NWRIA wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha fuṱahe (90).

src_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou dzinginya uri hu vhumbiwe NWRIA ine ya ḓo vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhupuḽani, zwa masheleni khathihi na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ya shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ine ya vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo vhona uri hu khou vha na nḓisedzo ya maḓi ine ya nga bvela phanḓa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu, yo linganaho nahone ine ya fulufhedzea zwi tshi elana na ṱhoḓea ya ndayotewa ya kona swikela wana maḓi khathihi na vhupo ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu re na mutakalo.

src_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo vhumbiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu ya 2 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni Muvhuso, wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga  Thaneḽe ya Trans-Caledon..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa Phaḽamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khwinisa Mulayo wa Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni, wa 2007 (Mulayo 12 wa 2007)..   Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo langa maanḓa mimasipala musi tshi ta mithelo ya mveledziso musi zwi tshi ḓa kha khumbelo dza mveledziso ya mavu dze dza rumelwa kha mimasipala.

src_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwiniso dzi ḓo ita uri mimasipala thome badelisa mithelo iyi nga nḓila pfalaho re khagala nahone yo fhelelaho.

src_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe uyu nga ṅwaha wa 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani na tshitshavha..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni, wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso ya Milayo ya sumbe, ine ya vha (1) Mulayo wa Tshikwama tsha Phentsheni ya Zwiimiswa zwi Elanaho, wa 1963 (Mulayo 41 wa 1963); (2) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1976 (Mulayo 84 wa 1976); (3) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso wa 1996; (4) Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Masheleni na Gwama, wa 1997 (Mulayo 99 wa 1997); (5) Mulayo wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya Mavu na Vhulimi, wa 2002 (Mulayo 15 wa 2002); (6) Mulayo wa Mishumo ya zwa Muvhalelano, wa 2005 (Mulayo 26 wa 2005) na (7) Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Mishumo ya Muvhalelano wa 2021 (Mulayo 5 wa 2021).

Uhu khwiniswa hune ha khou dzinginywa hu katela, nga fhasi ha Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1996 katelwa ha muthu ane wa dzula nae lwa tshoṱhe kha mbuelo dza bva murahu nga ḽa 27 Lambamai.

src_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Khwiniso dza milayo ya phentsheni dzi ḓo ita uri vhafarisi vha kone swikela mbuelo dzavho dza phentsheni na zwenezwo nga murahu ha musi mbingano yo no fhaladzwa ḓadzisa kha zwa bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha Minisṱa wa Gwama na kha zwa muvhalelano, khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza shandukisa maanḓa komiti ya khombetshedzo afho hune muṱolambalelano ṱanganedza uri ita vhukhakhi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo phaḓaladzwa hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi.

src_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).
The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa.

src_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri dzudzanyiwe hafhu.

src_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi Mulayotibe une wa vha na zwipiḓa zwinzhi une wa khou khwinisa Milayo ya zwino ine ya vha  Mulayo wa Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, wa 2001 (Mulayo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Mulayo wa Madzangano sa Shumeli Malamba, wa 1997 (Mulayo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Ndaka ya Vhufarandaka, wa 1988 (Mulayo 57 wa 1988); (iv) Mulayo wa Dzikhamphani, wa 2008 (Mulayo 71 wa 2008) na  Mulayo wa Milayo ya Sekhithara ya zwa Masheleni, wa 2017 ( Mulayo 9  2017).

src_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.
tgt_text: hwiniso idzi ndi dzine dza khou fhindula kha vhuṱudzeṱudze he ha bviselwa khagala nga tshifhinga tsha tsenguluso ya shango musi ḽi tshi vhambedzwa na maṅwe ye ya itwa nga vha Tshigwada tsha Shuma tsha Mishumo ya zwa Masheleni (FATF).

Muvhigo wa tsenguluso iyi ya vhoṱhe wo ita themendelo dza 40 dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi shume nga nḓila ine ḽa khou tevhedza maga ḽifhasi u fhelisa zwiito zwa dzumbetshedzwa ha masheleni khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa masheleni kha zwiito zwa vhutherorisi..   Afrika Tshipembe ḽo wanala ḽi tshe ḽo salela murahu kha masia   Hoyu Mulayotibe amba nga ha masia 14 kha ayo a bviselwa khagala.

src_text: Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa FATF bva nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.
The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine zwa si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine ya si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone dzudzanywa hafhu.

src_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.
tgt_text: Mulayo uyu wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi siho Mulayoni, wa 1992 (Mulayo 140 wa 1992) ita uri magwa na phaḓaladzwa ha zwithu zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe zwe zwa bulwa nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 1 na Sheduḽu 2 ya uno Mulayo zwi vhe vhugevhenga..   Khwiniso idzo dzi lavhelesa na kha sa tea ha Khethekanyo 63, ye ya wanala sa tshimbilelani na ndayotewa kha ḽa uri Minisṱa ṋewe pfanelo dza khwinisa sheduḽu hu songo vha na kwama maitele zwa mulayo.

src_text: Rugby World Cup Sevens.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2020, Khothe ya Ndayotewa yo ḓivhadza uri Khethekanyo 63 ya Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi wa 1992 u khou tshimbilelana na ndayotewa ya fhedza nga imisa zwa sa tea hawo swika nga ḽa 17 Nyendavhusiku 2022 itela ṋetshela Phaḽamennde tshikhala tsha khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze uho    Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: South Africa will host the Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 in Cape Town between 9 and 11 September.
tgt_text: Mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: The showcase event is held for the first time on the African continent and will see 24 men’s and 16 women’s teams from across the world competing  Messages.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fara mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 ngei Ḓoroboni ya Kapa vhukati ha ḽa 9 na ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: Banyana Banyana, for making history and winning South Africa’s first ever Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), at the 2022 WAFCON finals held in Rabat, Morocco on Saturday, 23 July.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu ha misumbedzo vhu khou ḓo farelwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tou thoma nahone hu ḓo vha na thimu dza vhanna dza 24 na dza vhafumakadzi dza 16 bva ḽifhasini nga angaredza dzine dza ḓo vha dzi tshi khou ṱaṱisana kha vhuṱambo uvhu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela mulaedza wayo wa fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: ●  Thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana, nge vha ita ḓivhazwakale khathihi na fhenya kha muṱaṱisano wa tou thoma wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Tshiphuga tsha Afrika tsha Vhafumakadzi (WAFCON), kha mutambo wa bola ya milenzhe kha makhaulatshele WAFCON ya 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Rabat, kha ḽa Morocco nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 23 Fulwi.

src_text: At the same time, they qualified for next year’s FIFA women’s World Cup to be jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand from 20 July to 20 August.
tgt_text: Nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi, vho dovha hafhu vha kona swikela dzhenela mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha ṅwaha ḓaho tsha bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi tsha FIFA ine ya ḓo farwa khathihi nga shango ḽa Australia na ḽa New Zealand bva nga ḽa 20 Fulwi swika 20 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Team South Africa, for winning 27 medals in various disciplines at the 2022 Commonwealth Games held in Birmingham, England from 28 July to 8 August.
tgt_text: ●  Vha Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe, nge vha thuba mendele ya 27 kha mitambo yo fhambanaho musi vha tshi khou shela mulenzhe kha Mitambo ya Commonwealth ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Birmingham, England bva nga ḽa 28 Fulwana swika ḽa 8 Ṱhangule.

src_text: They ended ninth overall with seven gold, nine silver and 11 bronze medalsSpringbok Women, for their win over Spain in their first of two Women’s Winter Series test matches at Emirates Airline Park in Johannesburg.Ms Ndavi Nokeri (23), for being crowned the new Miss South Africa.
tgt_text: Vho fhedza vho wana vhuimo ha vhuṱahe nga angaredza, vhe na mendele ya musuku ya sumbe, ya ṱahe ya siḽivhere na ya fumithihi ya burontsi.●  Thimu ya Vhafumakadzi ya Springbok, nge vha kunda thimu ya Spain kha mutambo wavho wa thoma kha wa ndingo mbili dza Women’s Winter Series fhaḽa Emirates Airline Park kha ḽa Johannesburg.●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ndavi Nokeri (23), nge vha ambadzwa khare ya vha Ralunako wa Afrika Tshipembe muswa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ms Ashleigh Buhai, for winning the 2022 AIG Women’s Open and becoming the third South African woman to win major gold championship.
tgt_text: ●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ashleigh Buhai, nge vha fhenya 2022 AIG Women’s Open khathihi na vha mufumakadzi wa vhuraru wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe kha fhenya kha mutambo muhulwane wa vhugweṋa ha musuku.

src_text: Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of: ● Tokollo  “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), the musician, singer and songwriter who rose to fame when he together with two of his friends started their kwaito music group in  1996 called TKZee  Appointments.
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: ●   Vho Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa nyimbo dza muzika vhe vha takuwa vha ḓivhea vhukuma musi vha tshi vhumba tshigwada tsha zwa muzika na khonani dzavho mbili nga ṅwaha wa 1996 tshe tsha vha tshi tshi ḓivhea sa TKZee tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwiṱuku ha phimo ya vhushayamushumo ha shango, yo tsaho nga.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: 6% bva kha.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the slight decline in the country’s unemployment rate, which dropped by.
tgt_text: 5% kha kotara ya thoma ya kha.

src_text: 6 percent, from.
tgt_text: 9% kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: 5% in the first quarter to.
tgt_text: Tshivhalo tsho ganḓiswaho kha Tsedzuluso ya zwa Vhashumi ya Kotara iṅwe na iṅwe bva kha vha Mbalombalo ya Afrika Tshipembe sumbedza uri mishumo minzhisa yo rekhodiwa kha Tshumelo dza Matshilisano na Tshitshavha (276 000), Mbambadzo (169 000), Masheleni (128 000) na zwa fhaṱa (104 000).

src_text: 9 percent in the second quarter of.
tgt_text: Tshivhaloguṱe tsha vhathu vha shumaho tsho ima kha 15, 6 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022, ngeno tsha vhathu vha sa shumiho tsho gonya nga 132 000 swika kha 8, 0 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na kotara yo fhiraho dzika uhu naho hu na mbuelo dzi takadzaho hu sumbedza uri vhuḓidini ho khwaṱhaho nga muvhuso na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso alusa ikonomi na sika mishumo minzhisa ine ya khou ṱoḓea vhukuma vhu khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo.

src_text: The figures published in the Quarterly Labour Force Survey by Statistics South Africa show that the biggest job gains were recorded in Community and Social Services (276 000), Trade (169 000), Finance (128 000) and Construction (104 000)..
tgt_text: Hezwi ndi ṱhanzielo ya uri arali ri tshi shumisana roṱhe nga khwaṱhisa nungo dzashu dzoṱhe, ri nga kunda khaedu dzo livhanaho na ikonomi yashu.

src_text: The total number of employed persons stood at 15, 6 million in the second quarter of 2022, and the number of unemployed persons increased by 132 000 to 8, 0 million in the second quarter of 2022 compared to the previous quarter.
tgt_text: Khabinethe pfesesa dinalea ha Maafrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi khou kundelwa wana zwa ḓitshidza ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe nga vhanga ḽa ḓura ha zwithu na phimo ya vhushayamushumo re nṱha vhukuma.

src_text: These modest yet impressive gains show that the concerted efforts by government and its social partners to grow the economy and create much-needed jobs are beginning to bear fruit..
tgt_text: Sa muvhuso ṱhogomelaho, ri dzula ro ḓiimisela na ḓikumedzela kha shumisana na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso itela fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine ha muthu muṅwe na muṅwe.

src_text: This is testament to the fact that if we all work together by harnessing our collective strengths, we can overcome the challenges facing our economy..
tgt_text: Muvhuso dzula wo ḓikumedzela tikedza mabindu apo nga renga na shumisa thundu na tshumelo dzapo.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of South Africans as they struggle to go about their daily lives owing to the cost of living and high unemployment rate.
tgt_text: Themamveledziso ya Muvhuso.

src_text: As caring government, we remain determined and committed to working together with our social partners to build better tomorrow for everyone.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sasaladza tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso nga vhadzuli vha Togaat ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha migwalabo ya khaedu ya ṱhahelelo ya  maḓi.

src_text: Government remains committed to supporting local businesses by buying local goods and services.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ita khuwelelo ya vhudziki na vhukonḓeleli sa zwi mushumo kati wa vhuedzedza Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Khabinethe khou pfesesa dinalela ha vhadzuli vhe vha ḓo tea shumisa mathannge maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu bva tshe ha vha na tshiwo tsha miḓalo mathomo uno ṅwaha.

src_text: Public infrastructure.
tgt_text: Honeha, dzikhakhathi na zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwi fhelisi thaidzo, nahone tshinyadza themamveledzido ya lushaka zwi kwamesa zwitshavha zwa tsinisa.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the destruction of infrastructure by Tongaat residents in KwaZulu-Natal during protest over access to water.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo wa.

src_text: Cabinet called for calm and patience as work is underway to restore the Tongaat Water Treatment Works.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ṱanganedza sainwa vha mulayo ha Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2022 (Mulayo 3 wa 2022) nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.
Mulayo ṱoḓa khwinisa khaphasithi na phimo ya maitelendavhelelwa muvhuso wapo.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of residents who have had to use water tankers for an extended period since the flooding earlier this year.
tgt_text: Mulayo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso ita uri Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha shume nga vhukoni na khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo dzo khwaṱhaho dza tshumelo kha vhathu, sa pfanelo ya mutheo yo ṅwalwaho kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya..  Mulayo ṱalusa maitele ane tea tevhelwa musi hu tshi tholwa vhathu kha poswo khulwane.

src_text: However, violence and anarchy are not solution, and the destruction of public infrastructure only hurts local communities.
tgt_text: Zwa zwino thivhela vhaofisiri vha tshitshavha vhahulwane uri vha vhe na vhuimo kha zwa poḽotiki kha mahoro zwa poḽotiki.

src_text: Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act of.
tgt_text: Nga Mulayo uyu hafhu, poswo dza mulanguli wa masipala dzi lavhelelwa kungedzelwa kha lushaka lwoṱhe itela kunga vhunzhi ha vhonkhetheni vho teaho..  Khabinethe na fulufhelo uri tshanduko idzi dzi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri avho vhane vha tholwa kana khethwa kha maimo aneo vha ḓo kona bveledza zwe vha fulufhedzisa itela uri ri swikelele ṋetshedzo ya vhutshilo ha khwine kha vhathu vhoṱhe.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the signed into law the Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act, 2022 (Act 3 of 2022) by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Vhugevhenga.

src_text: The Act aims to improve the capacity and ethical standards of local government.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa vhashumi vha thelisaho zwiṱunḓwa vha Tshumelo ya Muthelo ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha wana  785 kg ya zwidzidzivhadzi zwa crystal meth zwi linganaho R236 miḽioni ya thengiso siho mulayoni ngei OR Tambo International Airport nga Swondaha ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule ṅwaha wa dzumbululwa ha zwidzidzivhadzi izwi zwo ḓo rumela mulaedza wa khaidzo kha zwigwada zwa vhugevhenga ho dzudzanywaho wa uri vhuimangalavha ha dzhena na bva ho tsireledzwa vhukuma nahone vhaofisiri vhashu vha khou shuma nga maanḓa fhelisa zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: The law forms part of government’s efforts to professionalise the Public Service and ensure the sustainable provision of services to the people, as basic right enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of..
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Khoro nga ha Ṱhoḓisiso ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha (CHE)  kha Miholo ya Ṱhoho dza zwa Pfunzo na Ndaulo Dziyunivesithi (Vice Chancellors) na Vhalanguli vha Vhahulwane Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The Act specifies the processes to be followed for senior position appointments.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo nyeṱulelwa nga ha mvelelo dza ṱhoḓisiso ya CHE ye ya tiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020 nga Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli, Dokotela Vho Blade Nzimande ṱola ḽeveḽe dza muholo na maitele fanaho zwa khorondangi dza yunivesithi kha miṅwaha fhiraho 15 bva nga ṅwaha wa 2005 swika wa..  Ṱhoḓisiso yo vha ya wana nḓila yo khwaṱhaho konadzeaho na mveledziso ya dziyunivesithi kana sekhithara ya pfunzo ya nṱha kha shango.

src_text: It now prevents senior public officials from holding political office in political parties.
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu sumbedzisa mawanwa mahulwane khathihi na themendelo  dza ndulamiso dzo dzinginywaho.

src_text: Also with this Act in place, vacant municipal manager posts are expected to be advertised nationally to attract wide pool of suitable candidates..
tgt_text: Themendelo dzi ṋetshedza, vhukati ha dziṅwe, maitele miholo khwaṱhaho nahone ane vha khagala thomiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha vhulavhelesi tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe tsha nga nnḓa ingamela maitele u dzhia tsheo dza miholo dovha ya ṋetshedza khwaṱhiswa ha sisiṱeme dza ela kushumele kha zwiimiswa.

src_text: Cabinet is confident that these changes will ensure that those who are appointed or elected into these positions will be able to deliver on their promises so that we can achieve better life for all.
tgt_text: Ngudo yo dovha ya dzhiela nṱha vhuhulu ho fhambanaho ya zwiimiswa izwi na dovha ita ndinganyiso na maitele dzitshaka.

src_text: Crime.
tgt_text: Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli vha khou lavhelelwa haseledza nga ha muvhigo uyu na vhurangaphanḓa ha yunivesithi sa ḽiga ḽa khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo izwi.

src_text: Cabinet commended the South African Revenue Service’s customs officials for seizing 785 kg of crystal meth with street value of R236 million at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 28 August.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha na Vhutumbuli: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: The drug bust will send clear warning to criminal syndicates that our ports of entry and exit are well protected and our officers are working hard to stamp out any criminality   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Tshanduko Ṱavhanyedzaho ya Khaphasithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso na Pfunzo  kha Sekhithara ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha.

src_text: Report of the Council on Higher Education (CHE) Enquiry into the Remuneration of University Vice Chancellors and Senior Executive Managers in South Africa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe tikedza themendelo ya risetshe mbili dzo itwaho eletshedza nga ha maga ane fanela dzhiwa itela ṱavhanyisa tshanduko ya risetshe na khaphasithi ya funza kha zwiimiswa zwa ngudo dza nṱha.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed on the outcomes of the CHE enquiry that was commissioned in 2020 by the Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation, Dr Blade Nzimande, to examine the remuneration levels and trends of the university executives over the 15-year period from 2005 to..
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa thoma wo itwa nga Tshigwada tsha Mushumo tsha Dziminisṱa ṱoḓisisa zwithivheli zwi thivhelaho mushumo wa thola fara vhashumi na mvelaphanḓa ya  vhorapfunzo vha vharema Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The investigation was to establish the sustainability, viability and development of the universities or higher education sector in the country.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuvhili – wo itwa nga Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhutumbuli na Tshiimiswa tsha Ṱhoḓisiso tsha Lushaka – wo itwa nga Yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe, vhuimeli ha tshiimiswa ho angaredzaho ha yunivesithi dza muvhuso dza 26 kha shango.

src_text: This report outlines the key findings together with proposed remedial recommendations..
tgt_text: Mivhigo heyi yoṱhe dzinginya zwiṱirathedzhi zwa thusedzo ṱavhanyisa tshanduko kha masia maṱanu ṱanḓavhuwaho, ane vha kha postgraduate pineline; vhudzheneli nga vhashumi; mvelele ya tshiimiswa na maitele; mbekanyamushumo na tshiṱirathedzhi, na zwiko zwi si zwinzhi.

src_text: The recommendations propose, amongst others strengthened and more transparent remuneration process.
tgt_text: Pfano ya Dzitshaka nga ha Zwiko zwa Dzhenetiki zwa Zwimela zwa Zwiḽiwa na Vhulimi (Pfano).

src_text: The setting up of an external and independent oversight structure to oversee the decision-making process of remunerations.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Pfano Phalamenndeni uri sainwe sa thendelano.

src_text: It also proposes the strengthening of the performance evaluation systems in the institutions.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a Pfano, ine ya eletshedza mashango ane vha muraḓo ambedzana na vhona uri hu na tshumiso yo khwaṱhaho ya zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela zwa zwiḽiwa na vhulimi saina Pfano iyi zwi ḓo dovha zwa khwaṱhisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha shango kha ndondolo na kushumisele ko khwaṱhaho kwa zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela, na ṋetshedza thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwa mahayani.

src_text: The study has also taken into account the various sizes of these institutions and it also did international benchmarking.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe (Just Transition) ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation is expected to discuss this report with the university leadership as measure to strengthen these academic institutions.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: The report will thereafter be published in the Department of Higher Education and Training’s website: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Muhanga ṋetshedza bono ḽi fanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi linganaho na ḽi konḓelelaho kilima ṱalutshedza masia milayo na mbekanyamaitele zwa swikelela izwi.

src_text: Accelerated Transformation of the Research and Teaching Capacity in the Higher Education Sector.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa tshanduko ḓo kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe Afrika Tshipembe, na ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha tandulula vhushayandingano ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na sika ikonomi vhuedzaho vhoṱhe.

src_text: Cabinet supported the recommendations of the two studies that were commissioned to advise on the measures to be put in place so as to accelerate the transformation of research and teaching capacity in the institutions of higher learning.
tgt_text: Khomishini ya Kilima ya Phresidennde yo tshimbidza maitele vhukwamani vhuhulwane na vhashumisani vha wana thikhedzo yo ṱanḓavhuwaho ya muhanga.

src_text: The first report was done by the Ministerial Task Team which investigated the blockages that prevent the recruitment, retention and progression of black South African academics.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri tsudzuluwo ya kha ikonomi sa shumisi khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050 fanela tikedza dzangalelo ḽa lushaka, hu tshi katela na mishumo ya khwine ya vhoṱhe,  khwiniso ya vhudzheneli ha tshitshavhani na pheliso ya vhushai.

src_text: The second report – commissioned by the Department of Science and Innovation and the National Research Foundation – was done by Universities South Africa, the umbrella body representative of the 26 public universities in the country.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisani na muvhuso tikedza na ṱanganedza muhanga uyu.

src_text: Both these reports proposes intervention strategies to accelerate transformation in five broad areas, namely in postgraduate pineline; staff participation; institutional culture and practice; policy and the strategy, and limited resources.
tgt_text: Pulane yo dodombedzwaho ya thoma shumisa muhanga ḓo bveledzwa, nahone ḓo dzheniswa kha vhupulani ha muvhuso na maitele mugaganyagwama.
Garaṱa dza Ḽaisentsi ya reila Ntswa dza Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (the Treaty).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓo thoma shumiswa ha Garaṱa ya Ḽaisentsi ya reila ntswa ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo zwa khwine fhira ine ya vha hone zwino.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Treaty to Parliament for accession.
tgt_text: Sisiṱeme ya zwino yo shumiswa bva kha ṅwaha wa.

src_text: This will enable South Africa to form part of the parties to this Treaty, which guides the member countries in conserving and ensuring the sustainable usage of the plant genetic resources for food and agriculture.
tgt_text: Thekhinoḽodzhi bva zwenezwo yo no shanduka nahone zwi vho ḓura ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya ḽaisentsi dzine ndi kale ri khou shumisa dzone kha tshifhinga tsha zwino.

src_text: Acceding to this Treaty will also strengthen the country’s commitment towards conservation and sustainable use of plant genetic resources, and provide support to rural communities.
tgt_text: Garaṱa ntswa yo dzinginywaho ḓo ita uri ḽaisentsi ya reila kone shuma na International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).

src_text: Just Transition Framework for South Africa.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Mbekanyamushumo dza Mishumo ya Tshitshavha dzo Engedzwaho (EPWP).

src_text: Cabinet approved the Just Transition Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa kha  gazethe mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya EPWP itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: The framework presents shared vision for an equitable, climate-resilient South Africa.
tgt_text: EPWP ndi iṅwe ya mbekanyamushumo khulwane dza muvhuso yo livhiswaho kha ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya muholo na kha vhushai nga sika zwikhala zwa mushumo wa tshifhinga nyana, nga maanḓa kha vhaswa na vhafumakadzi.

src_text: It defines the principles and policy areas to achieve this.
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya mbekanyamaitele ntswa khwaṱhisa mbekanyamushumo na ṋea ṱhaluso kha masia fanaho na zwa miholo, modele wa ndambedzo na tsireledzo ya matshilisano, na livhanyisa EPWP na maitele zwa mushumo ano maḓuvha ṱuṱuwedza vhushumisani vhukati ha muvhuso na sekhithara ya phuraivethe kha khwaṱhisedza uri  EPWP shela mulenzhe zwihulwane vhukuma kha tsiko ya mishumo yavhuḓi na fhungudza vhushai.

src_text: The transition framework will impact everyone in South Africa, and provides an opportunity to address historical inequities and creates an economy that benefits all.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhutumbuli kha mathomo mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha mona na shango.

src_text: The Presidential Climate Commission conducted an extensive consultation process with social partners and received broad support for the framework.
tgt_text: Khwiniso kha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that the shift to net-zero carbon economy by 2050 must support national development aspirations, including decent work for all, social inclusion and the eradication of poverty.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muelo, dizaini na bveledzwa ha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Cabinet has called on all social partners to rally behind and embrace this framework detailed implementation plan for the framework will be developed, and it will be integrated into the government planning and budgeting system.
tgt_text: (Fourth Decimal Coin Series).

src_text: New South African Driving Licence Card.
tgt_text: Yo ṱanganedza sisiṱeme ya sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumisa nyambo dza tshiofisi kha tshigwada tsha vhuṋa tsha khoini ya tshifumi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the replacement of the current Driving Licence Card to one with more secure design features..
tgt_text: Ipfi ‘Afrika Tshipembe’ ḽi ḓo dzheniswa kha lurumbu luthihi lwa dzikhoini khathihi na ganḓiswa nga nyambo dza tshiofisi dzoṱhe.

src_text: The current system has been in operation since.
tgt_text: Nyambo tharu dzi ḓo shumiswa kha khoini ya R5; nyambo mbili kha dzikhoini dza R2; 50c, 20c na 10c, R1 ḓo vha nga luambo luthihi.

src_text: The technology has since evolved and it is becoming expensive to maintain the current infrastructure.
tgt_text: Nyambo dzoṱhe hedzi dzi ḓo shumiswa nga sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha  kha miṅwaha ya 10 ḓaho.

src_text: The new proposed card will make the country’s driving licence compatible with the International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamitele yo Ṱanganelaho ya Ndangulo ya Khwaḽithi ya Maḓi (IWQM)  ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP) Policy.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa kha gazethe ha Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya IWQM itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft EPWP Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo dzinginywaho ḓo dzhena vhudzuloni ha Mbekanyamaitele ya WQM yo thomiwaho nga ṅwaha wa 1991 ine zwazwino yo fhelelwaho nga tshifhinga na tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tshe tsha thoma shuma nga ṅwaha wa..  Mbekanyamaitele iyi sumbedzisa zwigwada zwa milayo zwine zwa ḓo vhumba mutheo wa ndangulo ya khwaḽithi ya maḓi ṋetshedza ndivhanyiso kha milayo yoṱhe elanaho na zwa maḓi khathihi na vhuḓikumedzeli ha ḽino shango kha khaedu ya ḽifhasi kha zwa ṋetshedzo na ndondolo ya maḓi sa tshiko tshi shaeaho.

src_text: The EPWP is one of government's key programmes aimed at providing poverty and income relief by creating temporary work opportunities, particularly for youth and women..
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwentsi ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho.

src_text: The draft new policy will strengthen the programme and provide clarity on aspects such as wages, funding model and social protection, and also align the EPWP with modern labour practices.
tgt_text: (Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy).

src_text: It will promote partnerships between government and the private sector toward ensuring the EPWP contributes massively towards the creation of decent work and alleviation of poverty.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khanḓiso ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwensti ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho itela wana mahumbulwa nga tshitshavha.

src_text: The policy will also promote innovation in the implementation of public works programmes across the country..
tgt_text: Tshipekiṱiramu tsha firikhwentsi ya Radio ndi tshiko tsha mupo tshi sa vusuledzwi tshine tsha vha tsha vhuṱhogwa kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya didzhithala na themamveledziso ya zwa vhudavhidzani.

src_text: Amendments to the Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi yo dzinginywaho yo itelwa tikedza khovhelo ya sipekiṱiramu na ṋea ḽaisentsi ya ṱhingothendeleki dzi shumaho nga netiweke, khasho; ngudo ya saintsi ya zwa vhufhufhi na zwa maḓini; ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso; tswikelelo ya tshitshavha, na dziṅwe nḓowetshumo dzi elanaho na zwenezwi.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the dimension, design and compilation of the year 2023 Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza khovhelo linganaho na ndi nganyiso kha vhushelamulenzhe kha tshanduko ya sekhithara na tswikelelo ya ṱhumo ya didzhithala na kha zwipiḓa zwa nnḓa zwa shango.

src_text: It approved the annual rotational system of the usage of the official languages on the fourth decimal coin series.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa nanga Nkhetheni wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Khoro ya Dzitshaka ya Mbumbano ya Vhudavhidzani ha kule (ITU)  na Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio.

src_text: The word “South Africa” will be inserted on the one side of the coins and printed in all the official languages.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nkhetheni nangiwaho wa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Mandla Samuel Mchunu kha Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio ya ITU (Region .

src_text: Three languages will be used in the R5 coin; two languages R2; 50c, 20c and 10c coins and the R1 will be in one language.
tgt_text: Vho Mchunu zwa zwino vha khou shuma sa muraḓo wa bodo.

src_text: All these languages will be used on an annual rotational basis over the next 10 years.
tgt_text: Ho khou dzingingwa ḽa uri vha dovhe vha khethiwe kha Khoro ya ITU kha themu ya ṅwaha wa 2023 swika..  Khetho dzi ḓo vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha Khonferentsi ya Vhuimeli ha mashango (Plenipotentiary) ha ITU ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Bucharest, kha shango ḽa Romania bva nga ḽa 26 Khubvumedzi swika nga ḽa 14 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Draft Integrated Water Quality Management (IWQM) Policy of.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzula ḽo ḓikumedzela kha zwipikwa na ndivho ya ITU ya vala mukano wa zwa didzhithala na ṱumanya vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽifhasi  Vhuṱambo vhu khou ḓaho.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the Draft IWQM Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa.

src_text: The proposed policy will replace the outdated WQM Policy of 1991 and its strategy that was put in place in.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa nga Khubvumedzi uno ṅwaha ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero: “U pembelela Ifa ḽa Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika wa Mvelele wa Afrika Tshipembe”.
Khabinethe ṱuṱuwedza Maafrika Tshipembe vhoṱhe pembelela vhufa ha mvelele yashu ho pfumaho na phambano zwine zwa vha na maanḓa u ri ṱanganya sa lushaka.

src_text: The policy outlines set of principles that will form the basis for water quality management.
tgt_text: Ri fanela ḓikumedzela roṱhe kha shumisana itela fhelisa phambano na vhushayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhuḓipfi ha muhumbulo wa ḓihudza nga vha Muafrika Tshipembe  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:Vhathu vhoṱhe vho winaho, vho thubaho mimedala na vhaṱaṱisani vhe vha dzhenela kha 95th Comrades Marathon, une wa ḓivheswa nga pfi “Ultimate Human Race”, nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule.

src_text: It provides an alignment to all the relevant water-related legislation and the country’s global commitments to the provision and conservation of water as scarce resource.
tgt_text: Mbambe ya vhanna yo winwa nga Tete Dijana (awara dza 5, minetse ya 30, na mithethe ya 38) ane bva Mahikeng ngei Vhukovhela ha Devhula ngeno mugidimi wa shango ḽa Russia Alexandra Morozova (awara dza 6, minetse ya 17, na mithethe ya 47) wina mbambe ya vhafumakadzi.

src_text: Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy.
Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy for public comment.
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:Mama Vho Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), Mulwelambofholowo wa kale na mutshimbidzi wa dzangano ḽa vhashumi vhe vha dovha vha vha muṱanganedzi wa National Order of Luthuli nga ṅwaha wa 2004 kha “vhushelamulenzhe ha vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela pfanelo dza vhashumi na swikelelwa ha Afrika Tshipembe ḽa demokirasi ḽi sa khethululi nga muvhala, nga mbeu nahone ḽo vhofholowaho ”.Vhaofisiri vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS)  vhe vha vha vhe vhaṋameli kha bupo ḽa SAPS ḽe ḽa wa ngei Rand Airport, Germiston nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Radio frequency spectrum is finite natural resource that is vital to the growth of South Africa’s digital economy and communication infrastructure.
tgt_text: Vha SAPS vha khou ita ṱhoḓisiso ya tshivhangi tsha wa ha bupo iḽo.

src_text: The proposed policy intends to support the spectrum allocation and licensing for fixed mobile; broadcasting; aeronautical and marine; research and development; community access, and other relevant industries.
tgt_text: Khabinethe tamela mashudu mutshimbidzabupo huvhalesaho uri fhola nga ṱavhanya  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teahoa.

src_text: The policy also seeks to promote equity and fair allocation to contribute towards the transformation of the sector and accessibility of digital connectivity even in outlying parts of the country.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Gugulethu Abigail Thimane sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Vhuvheaiṱo kha Sekhithara ya Muvhuso na Mveledziso ya Khaphasithi kha Muhasho wa Vhupulani, Vhuvheaiṱo na ela  Mufumakadzi Vho Kwena Komape sa DDG: Mveledziso ya zwa Ikonomi, Mbambadzo na Vhuvhambadzi kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mvusuludzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Mahayani  Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadzwa nga ha vhukoni ha Eskom ha fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi zwine zwa khou dzulela itea tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga Minisṱa wa Mabindu Muvhuso khathihi na ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho swika zwino bva kha Komiti ya zwa Thekiniki ine ya vha nga fhasi ha Komiti ya Lushaka ya nga ha Thaidzo dza Fulufulu.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed by Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan on the capacity of Eskom to mitigate the intermittent load-shedding and also received progress report from the Technical Committee of the National Energy Crisis Committee.

tgt_text: Hu ḓo dovha hafhu ha vha na dziṅwe nḓivhadzo dzine dza ḓo itwa nga murahu ha khunyeledzwa ha nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho dza nga ha mivhigo iyi.

src_text: Further announcements will be made following the conclusion of the intensive deliberations of these reports.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa vhaisala hayo nga thithisea na kanganyisea hune ha khou vhangwa nga khauwa ha muḓagasi kha vhoramabindu na ngomu miṱani, nga maanḓa musi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga tshifhinga tshine muvhuso wa khou ḓidzhenisa kha maga u tandulula thaidzo iyi a ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.

src_text: Cabinet expressed regret at the disruption and inconvenience caused by load-shedding to businesses and households, particularly happening at the time when government is engaged with the interventions announced by the President in July.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa zwa Vhumagi ḽa Sandvik Khomanani, fhaḽa Kempton Park, ḽe ḽa vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dza zwa vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R350-miḽioni dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha Muṱangano wa zwa Vhubindudzi wa Afrika Tshipembe (SAIC) we wa farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe..     Tshifhaṱo itshi tshiswa tsha muelo linganaho 62 000 square-metre ndi tshine tsha ṱanganyisa fhethu huthihi mishumo ye kale ya vha tshi itwa kha mamaga maṱanu fhambanaho nahone tshi na vhashumi vha swikaho.

src_text: Investment.
tgt_text: Ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mamaga ha Sandvik mahulwanesa nahone musalauno ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni ha bveledza magandakanda u shuma migodini hu tshi shumiswa 60% ya zwibveledzwa zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza madalo zwa vhulavhelesi nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi rwelwa ṱari tshiimiswa tsha zwa vhumagi tsha Hesto Harnesses fhaḽa Stanger, hune ha vha KwaDukuza nga ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the new Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site in Kempton Park, which was part of the R350-million investment pledged at the fourth South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) held at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesburg on 24 March..
tgt_text: Hetshi tshiimiswa ndi tshiṅwe tsha thandela ṱhanu khulwane dzine dza vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dzi linganaho  4-biḽioni dze dza itwa nga vha ha Metair Investments Limited itela tikedza zwa engedzwa na fhaṱwa ha mimoḓoro miswa ya Ford Ranger fhano hayani.

src_text: The new 62 000 square-metre facility consolidates operations previously undertaken at five separate sites and accommodates about 550 employees.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho dovha hafhu vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha vulwa ha thandela ya vusuluswa na engedzwa ha ḽimaga ḽa Sappi Saiccor Mill ḽine ḽa ḓura masheleni linganaho R7,7 biḽioni fhaḽa Umkomaas, zwine hezwi zwo livhiswa kha engedza vhukoni khathihi na vhea khamphani iyi kha maimo nṱhesa ḽifhasini ngeno nga thungo hu tshi khou sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi na ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: It is one of Sandvik’s biggest and most advanced facilities globally, and has the ability to produce underground loaders with over 60% South African content..
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu vhumba tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dze dza itwa nga vhoranḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha muṱangano wa SAIC.

src_text: Cabinet further welcomed the oversight visit by President Ramaphosa in KwaZulu-Natal during the launch of the Hesto Harnesses manufacturing facility in Stanger, KwaDukuza on 13 September.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa kha shango ḽashu vhu thusa kha vusuluswa na vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu khathihi na vhea shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhubindudzi..     Mveledziso ya themamveledziso.

src_text: This facility is one of five capital investment projects that form part of R. 4-billion commitment by Metair Investments Limited to support the expansion and localisation of the new Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa ha tshipiḓa tshiswa tsha bada ya Musina Ring Road ngei Limpopo ine ya ḓo leludzela vhathu uri vha kone enda zwavhuḓi mona na ḓorobo ya Musina khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na engedzea ha mbambadzo na miṅwe mishumo ya zwa ikonomi vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na maṅwe mashango Tshitshavha tsha Mveledziso tsha Tshipembe ha Afrika.

src_text: The President also attended the opening of the Sappi Saiccor Mill upgrade and expansion project worth R7,7 billion in Umkomaas, which is aimed at increasing the capacity and global competitiveness of the company while also creating short- and long-term employment opportunities..
tgt_text: Thandela ya masheleni swikaho R640-miḽioni yo sika mishumo ya tshoṱhe linganaho 275 hu tshi itelwa vhadzulapo vha vhupo honoho khathihi na ṋetshedza zwikhala kha zwitshavha zwapo hu tshi katelwa na mabindu maṱuku vhukati na mahulwane (SMMEs)..     Uhu fhaṱwa ha bada ya Musina Ring Road ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso tsha mbekanyamushumo ya themamveledziso ya muvhuso, hu tshi shumiswa ERRP ine muhumbulo wayo muhulwane wa vha bveledza nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na zwikhala zwa mishumo kha sekhithara dzoṱhe dzo fhambanaho na zwitshavha nga angaredza..     Tshiwo tsha fhaḽa Jagersfontein.

src_text: These investments form part of pledges made by industrialists at the SAIC.
Every new investment into our country assists in the reconstruction and recovery of our economy, and continues to profile South Africa as an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedza mapifi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ya avho vhe vha lovha  musi masalela mugodi wo ṱutshelwaho henefho kha vhupo honoho ha Jagersfontein vhu re vunḓuni ḽa Gauteng tshi swika hune pwashea, ha fhedza ho vha na lurofhe lwa khombo lwe lwa elela henefho musi ḓuvha ḽi tshi thoma bva nga matsheloni Swondaha, ya ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Infrastructure development.
tgt_text: Tshiwo itsho tsho dovha hafhu tsha sia themamveledziso ya kha vhupo honoho, ndaka dza vhathu zwavho fana na zwiendedzi khathihi na miṱa minzhi zwo tshinyadzwa vhukuma.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the new section of the Musina Ring Road in Limpopo that will make it easier for people to move around Musina, and also allow for increased trade and economic activity between South Africa and the Southern African Development Community countries.
The R640-million project created over 275 full-time jobs for locals and provided opportunities for local communities and small, medium and micro enterprises (SMMEs)..

The construction of the Musina Ring Road is part of government’s infrastructure programme, through the ERRP, that seeks to create inclusive growth and employment opportunities across various sectors and communities.
tgt_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho henefho kha vhupo he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 12 Khubvumedzi 2022, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho sumbedza takalela mushumo wa phuluso na mbuedzedzo une wa khou itwa henefho kha vhupo honoho.

src_text: Jagersfontein disaster.
tgt_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha ṋea pfulufhedziso ya uri muvhuso ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo yo teaho kha vhadzulapo vha Jagersfontein vho kwameaho.

src_text: 1 Cabinet expressed its sincere condolences to the families of those who lost their lives after the tailings of an abandoned local mine in Jagersfontein in the Free State burst open and released disastrous mudslide around dawn on Sunday, 11 September.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedzea vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri vhaṋe vha mugodi uyu vho amba uri vho ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso na thikhedzo ya zwa thekiniki kha muvhuso arali hu tshi nga vha na khumbelo yo raloho nga vha Khoro ya zwa Minerala ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: The disaster also left the local infrastructure, personal properties such as vehicles and several homes severely damaged.. 2 During his visit to the disaster area on Monday, 12 September 2022, President Ramaphosa expressed appreciation for the rescue and recovery efforts being undertaken in the area.
He also pledged that government will provide the necessary support to the affected residents of Jagersfontein.

Cabinet is encouraged that the owners of the mine have said that they are ready to provide technical assistance and support to the government should it be requested by the Minerals Council South Africa.
tgt_text: Nḓowetshumo ya zwa migodi kha ḓi vha yone shelaho mulenzhe zwihulwane kha ikonomi nga kha mishumo yo tou livhanaho nayo na miṅwe ya nga thungo, mbuelo dzi bvaho kha thundu dzi rengiselwaho nnḓa khathihi na vhubindudzi ho tou livhaho bva mashangoni nnḓa nahone dzi shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha khwinifhadza matshilo vhathu vha re kha zwitshavha zwine migodi yeneyo ya wanala khazwo.

src_text: 3 The mining industry remains significant contributor to the economy through direct and indirect employment, export earnings, and foreign direct investment, and plays crucial role in improving the lives of people in mining communities.
4 Government and some non-governmental organisations intervened urgently by providing emergency shelter, trauma counselling and basic provisions such as blankets, mattresses and food parcels.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khathihi na maṅwe madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso wo dzhenelela nga ṱavhanya nga ṋetshedza vhudzulo ha shishi, thuso ya muhumbulo musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha ḽikhaulambilu khathihi na tshomedzo dza ndeme dzi fanaho na mabai, maṱirasi na zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa.

src_text: Water supply and electricity in the area have since been restored.
tgt_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi na muḓagasi kha vhupo uho yo vhuyelela ngonani swika zwino.

src_text: 5 Once the disaster site has been cleaned up, technicians are expected to undertake structural assessments of houses.
Cabinet thanked emergency services, civil-society organisations and members of the public for their generous contributions and assistance.
tgt_text: Musi vhupo uho he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela khaho ho no fhela kunakiswa hafhu, vhorathekiniki vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ite tsenguluso ya zwifhaṱo zwa dzinnḓu.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa tshumelo dza shishi, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na miraḓo ya tshitshavha kha thuso yavho khathihi na mpho dze vha dzi ṋetshedza..     Ikonomi.

src_text: Cabinet deliberated on the state of the economy in the country after Statistics South Africa’s (Stats SA) recent figures showed that the gross domestic product (GDP) for the second quarter of 2022 decreased by 0,7%.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ambedzana nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi kha shango ḽashu nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dza vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dzo sumbedzisa uri zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa shango (GDP) kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwo tsela fhasi nga 0,7%.

src_text: Factors which influenced this decrease included load-shedding, the Russia-Ukraine conflict, and the high cost of living and inflation.
tgt_text: Zwiitisi zwe zwa ṱuṱuwedza uhu tsela fhasi ndi zwi fanaho na khauwa ha muḓagasi, khakhathi dza vhukati ha shango ḽa Russia na ḽa Ukraine hu tshi katelwa na ḓura ha zwirengwa khathihi na tshanduko ya mitengo.

src_text: The interventions made by the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) have largely cushioned the country from the international headwinds, and also protected jobs and livelihoods.
tgt_text: Maga a dzhiiwa nga Pulane ya Mvusuludzo na Mbuedzedzo ya Ikonomi (ERRP) thusa shango vhukuma kha thaidzo dza ikonomi dze dza vha dzi tshi khou bvelela kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dovha hafhu tsireledza mishumo khathihi na nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo.

src_text: Government’s strong economic interventions are beginning to bear fruit, as evidenced in Stats SA’s recent Quarterly Labour Force Survey results, which showed that over 648 000 jobs were gained between the first and second quarters of  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Maga muvhuso khwaṱhaho zwa ikonomi khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo sa zwe zwa vhonala kha mvelelo dza zwenezwino dza Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza nga Kotara dza vha tshiimiswa tsha Mbalombalo tsha Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dze dza sumbedzisa uri ho vha na mishumo miswa swikaho 648 000 ye ya sikwa vhukati ha kotara ya thoma na ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) Framework for the National Youth Policy (NYP).
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi (M&E) wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYP).

src_text: Cabinet approved the M&E framework that will enable the effective monitoring and impact assessment of the pillars of the NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muhanga wa M&E une wa ḓo thusa kha ita uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi ho khwaṱhaho khathihi na tsenguluso ya masiandaitwa thikho dza NYP ya ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: The framework provides five high-level indicators which are aligned with the pillars of the NYP.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu ṋetshedza zwilinganyi zwiṱanu zwa maimo nṱha zwine zwa elana na thikho dza NYP.

src_text: The indicators were developed with the relevant stakeholders who have an interest in the development and empowerment of youth in the country.
tgt_text: Zwilinganyi izwi zwo bveledzwa nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vho teaho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo kha zwa mveledziso na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa fhano shangoni.

src_text: The data collection will be disaggregated in terms of age, gender, disability, racial grouping and the geographic setting of these interventions..
tgt_text: Zwa kuvhanganywa ha zwidodombedzwa zwi ḓo khethekanywa hu tshi tevhelwa miṅwaha, mbeu, vhuholefhali, tshigwada tsha murafho na vhupo vhune maga aya khou itwa khaho.

src_text: The monitoring will be done in all spheres of government, entities and the private sector.
The reports will be generated quarterly and published twice year..  Policy Framework for Integrated Planning.
tgt_text: Zwa vhulavhelesi zwi ḓo itwa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso, zwiimiswa na kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe.
